posts.title: 5 Uncomfortable Feelings That Let You Know You're on the Right Path
posts.markdown: Oftentimes it can be difficult to discern the difference between change and unhappiness.  Change is a natural part of life, and with it comes a myriad of different emotions.  When we start to feel uncomfortable with where we are in life, or where we think we’re headed, it often means that we are at the crux of change, and how we cope with this process says a lot about us.   Never fear change; change simply implies that you have to gain a new perspective or understanding.  Recognize those feelings of uneasiness or discomfort as steps that have been taken in the right direction.   Here are five uneasy feelings one gets when they’re on the right path: **Feeling lost or without direction – **This feeling might as well be the story of my life.  Does anyone really know what they want out of life?  It’s a hard question to answer.  Feeling lost is often confused as a negative emotion, when it actually means that you’re starting to live in the present moment.  Living outside of the narrative you have in your head regarding your life can be tough, but it’s a good thing.  Get used to living in the moment, it’s where you want to be. **Left Brain Fuzziness – **The right hemisphere of our brain is associated with intuition, creativity and emotions.  As you start to activate your right brain hemisphere more often, the left side of your brain gets a little groggy.  Tasks that involve organization, intense focus, and attention to detail will come less easy to you than they did before, but have no fear, you’re in a good place. **Having a strong need to be alone – **I get this feeling often, although I admit that I can be introverted at times.  When you find yourself suddenly uninterested in socializing with anyone this is a sign that you’re simply rebooting your system.  People’s problems and antics can wane on you, leaving you exhausted or feeling a little disconnected.  It’s all good, just take some time for yourself. **Feeling like your dreams are failing – **Remember that life narrative that I mentioned earlier?  Well, for some, the image of one’s life is very fragile, leaving one feeling depressed when certain things don’t pan out the way he or she expected them to.  Having big dreams is a good thing, always strive to achieve what you want to achieve, but also know that reality is much different than the picture being painted in your head. Strive to align your thoughts, feelings and emotions with with who you truly are and the reality you create for yourself will be better than the one being thought up in your mind. **Realizing you are responsible for your life and happiness – **It can be scary having the sudden realization that you are the only person responsible for your well-being and happiness.  Scary, because if your life suddenly takes a turn for the worse, there’s no one to turn to but yourself.  However, this feeling is a good thing, as it is the only true way to live freely.  Always keep it in your head that you are responsible for your you, no one else. (h/t **[Thought Catalog](http://thoughtcatalog.com/brianna-wiest/2015/12/16-uncomfortable-feelings-that-actually-indicate-youre-on-the-right-path/)**)
posts.html:
Oftentimes it can be difficult to discern the difference between change and unhappiness.  Change is a natural part of life, and with it comes a myriad of different emotions.  When we start to feel uncomfortable with where we are in life, or where we think we’re headed, it often means that we are at the crux of change, and how we cope with this process says a lot about us.  

Never fear change; change simply implies that you have to gain a new perspective or understanding.  Recognize those feelings of uneasiness or discomfort as steps that have been taken in the right direction.  

Here are five uneasy feelings one gets when they’re on the right path:

*Feeling lost or without direction – *This feeling might as well be the story of my life.  Does anyone really know what they want out of life?  It’s a hard question to answer.  Feeling lost is often confused as a negative emotion, when it actually means that you’re starting to live in the present moment.  Living outside of the narrative you have in your head regarding your life can be tough, but it’s a good thing.  Get used to living in the moment, it’s where you want to be.

*Left Brain Fuzziness – *The right hemisphere of our brain is associated with intuition, creativity and emotions.  As you start to activate your right brain hemisphere more often, the left side of your brain gets a little groggy.  Tasks that involve organization, intense focus, and attention to detail will come less easy to you than they did before, but have no fear, you’re in a good place.

*Having a strong need to be alone – *I get this feeling often, although I admit that I can be introverted at times.  When you find yourself suddenly uninterested in socializing with anyone this is a sign that you’re simply rebooting your system.  People’s problems and antics can wane on you, leaving you exhausted or feeling a little disconnected.  It’s all good, just take some time for yourself.

*Feeling like your dreams are failing – *Remember that life narrative that I mentioned earlier?  Well, for some, the image of one’s life is very fragile, leaving one feeling depressed when certain things don’t pan out the way he or she expected them to.  Having big dreams is a good thing, always strive to achieve what you want to achieve, but also know that reality is much different than the picture being painted in your head.

Strive to align your thoughts, feelings and emotions with with who you truly are and the reality you create for yourself will be better than the one being thought up in your mind.

*Realizing you are responsible for your life and happiness – *It can be scary having the sudden realization that you are the only person responsible for your well-being and happiness.  Scary, because if your life suddenly takes a turn for the worse, there’s no one to turn to but yourself.  However, this feeling is a good thing, as it is the only true way to live freely.  Always keep it in your head that you are responsible for your you, no one else.

(h/t Thought Catalog)

posts.title: Suffer From Migraines? This Drink Will Soothe the Pain in Minutes!
posts.markdown: One of my former partners used to suffer from the absolute worst migraines.  They would leave her bed-ridden, incapacitated, and reeling from the sudden, sharp jolts of pain in her head.  While her migraines were undoubtedly a bit more severe than your average, she is not alone in her suffering.   Over 36 million people in the United States are affected by migraines, which is close to one out of every ten people! While a migraine might get you off of work for the day, the intense pain doesn’t let you enjoy much of anything.  The constant head-throbbing and pounding can push even the most grounded people off of their game, as their duration can change wildly; they can last anywhere from four to seventy-two hours. Symptoms include nausea, vomiting, numbness, tingling sensations, dizziness and sensitivity to lights, noises and smells. Migraines are believed to be caused by a wide variety of different factors, including stress, alcohol consumption, allergies and deficiencies in the body.  However, it has been seen that the biggest indicator of migraines is dehydration and an electrolyte imbalance. Electrolytes support and regulate nerve function, they regulate the cardiovascular system, and they regulate muscle function, making them pretty important to a healthy body.  As migraines are an inflammatory response, Magnesium can also be beneficial when seeking relief from a migraine. **The recipe to soothe your aching head is actually pretty simple:** - 1 Cup of Water - Lemon Juice from One Whole Lemon - Two Teaspoons of Sea Salt - Try to obtain high quality salt, like pink Himalayan sea salt.  This incredibly pure salt has more than eighty different trace minerals, including the aforementioned Magnesium.  When you ingest these minerals quickly, the serotonin levels in your body increase, which directly helps quell pain and inflammation. While there isn’t a ton of research that readily proves this recipe 100% effective, the fact that it is common practice for nurses to inject electrolyte solutions into IV’s during a migraine patient’s visit should convince most people. It might be an old remedy, but there’s a reason that people use it.  It works.
posts.html:
One of my former partners used to suffer from the absolute worst migraines.  They would leave her bed-ridden, incapacitated, and reeling from the sudden, sharp jolts of pain in her head.  While her migraines were undoubtedly a bit more severe than your average, she is not alone in her suffering.  

Over 36 million people in the United States are affected by migraines, which is close to one out of every ten people!

While a migraine might get you off of work for the day, the intense pain doesn’t let you enjoy much of anything.  The constant head-throbbing and pounding can push even the most grounded people off of their game, as their duration can change wildly; they can last anywhere from four to seventy-two hours.

Symptoms include nausea, vomiting, numbness, tingling sensations, dizziness and sensitivity to lights, noises and smells.

Migraines are believed to be caused by a wide variety of different factors, including stress, alcohol consumption, allergies and deficiencies in the body.  However, it has been seen that the biggest indicator of migraines is dehydration and an electrolyte imbalance.

Electrolytes support and regulate nerve function, they regulate the cardiovascular system, and they regulate muscle function, making them pretty important to a healthy body.  As migraines are an inflammatory response, Magnesium can also be beneficial when seeking relief from a migraine.

The recipe to soothe your aching head is actually pretty simple:

  • 1 Cup of Water
  • Lemon Juice from One Whole Lemon
  • Two Teaspoons of Sea Salt
  • Try to obtain high quality salt, like pink Himalayan sea salt.  This incredibly pure salt has more than eighty different trace minerals, including the aforementioned Magnesium.  When you ingest these minerals quickly, the serotonin levels in your body increase, which directly helps quell pain and inflammation.

While there isn’t a ton of research that readily proves this recipe 100% effective, the fact that it is common practice for nurses to inject electrolyte solutions into IV’s during a migraine patient’s visit should convince most people.

It might be an old remedy, but there’s a reason that people use it.  It works.

posts.title: Advertising Commitment
posts.markdown:
HeartCenteredRebalancing is dedicated to transparency in our online community regarding the use of advertisements on our site. Going along with that honesty, we wold like to extend these values and responsibly disclose our use of advertisements along with their purpose and role.

### Why Ads?

We have teamed up with numerous companies to serve online ads in our content and sidebar. These ads assist in covering the costs that come along with spreading our message and reaching our collective goals.

Advertising funds are used for the following:

1. Research and writing articles
2. Server and infrastructure upkeep
3. Promotion and marketing
4. Funding various projects

### Why am I seeing weird ads?

Finding advertisers that display relevant content for our niche market has proven to be extremely challenging. We are constantly seeking to improve our advertisement quality and hope to achieve a positive user experience. **Please note that we currently do not support or endorse any products or services that are offered through the advertisements on our website.**

### Our Promise

In regards to our use of advertisements, we are committed to the following:

- Public disclosure regarding our use of online advertisements
- Clear marking of advertising units to allow visitors to make informed choices
- Paid advertisements that do not interfere with the website experience, e.g. no pop-ups, pop-unders, or auto-initiated audio/video
- Responsible use of the funds gathered from online advertising initiatives

### Questions or comments?

Please [***contact us***](http://heartcenteredrebalancing.com/contact-us/)if you have any questions or comments regarding our use of online advertisements.

posts.title: 5 Promising Signs You've Met Your Soul Mate
posts.markdown: By [**Andrea Schulman**](https://www.facebook.com/raiseyourvibrationtoday/?fref=ts) | **[Raise Your Vibration Today](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/2016/03/16/signs-youve-met-your-soul-mate/)** How do you know when the universe has brought you the love you’ve been seeking, or if you’ve only met another placeholder?  It is possible for us to be attracted to people who aren’t right for us, and in the midst of lust and attraction, it can be hard to decipher if you’ve truly met your soul mate. Below, I’ve compiled a few signs that I experienced when I met my husband, and they are signs that I hear from people who have found love again and again.  Now, this isn’t to say that you MUST experience all of these signs in order to have found love, but I’d say if you have a number of them you can be pretty well-assured you’ve got a keeper. ## 1. Instant attraction: Often, when you meet the person you are destined to be with, the first look can say it all.  To this day, I remember the first glance I had of my husband over 11 years ago. It was as if time froze. ## 2. Electricity: When you meet the perfect person for you, you might feel an “electric” or buzzing sensation when you touch them or get close to them. ## 3. posts.html:
By Andrea Schulman | Raise Your Vibration Today

How do you know when the universe has brought you the love you’ve been seeking, or if you’ve only met another placeholder?  It is possible for us to be attracted to people who aren’t right for us, and in the midst of lust and attraction, it can be hard to decipher if you’ve truly met your soul mate.

Below, I’ve compiled a few signs that I experienced when I met my husband, and they are signs that I hear from people who have found love again and again.  Now, this isn’t to say that you MUST experience all of these signs in order to have found love, but I’d say if you have a number of them you can be pretty well-assured you’ve got a keeper.

1. Instant attraction:

Often, when you meet the person you are destined to be with, the first look can say it all.  To this day, I remember the first glance I had of my husband over 11 years ago. It was as if time froze.

2. Electricity:

When you meet the perfect person for you, you might feel an “electric” or buzzing sensation when you touch them or get close to them.

3. Feeling like you’ve known the other person for years:

This is one of the most common signs of love. Pretty much every single person I’ve ever met who has fallen in love with a soul mate has told me they instantly felt as if they had known the other person for a lifetime, even though they had just met. 

4. Endless conversation:

People who have a strong connection often have a desire to speak at length when they first meet.  They often have conversations for hours over the phone or in person.

5. Knowing that “this is the one.”

I know this is a hard one to grasp if you haven’t yet experienced this phenomenon, but there is often an inner knowing that you’ve met the one for you. 

Related Article:The #1 Reason Why Your Soul Mate Is Still Out of Reach

These are five very promising signs  you’ve met your soul mate. This doesn’t mean that you must have all of these signs with someone in order for you to have found love, but rather that if you do you should absolutely sit up and pay attention.  When you meet someone who exhibits characteristics like these, it’s definitely time to take a chance and go for it.

XO, Andrea

Are you hung-up on a breakup or feeling rejected?

It’s time to get over the pain and get back to feeling happy.  After all, your happiness is what will guide you to true love. Sign up here for my free ebook: “Move on FAST: 10 Simple Law of Attraction Tips” and start feeling better* today.*

Article Source: “5 Promising Signs You’ve Met Your Soul Mate” was originally published by Raise Your Vibration Today and has been reposted with permission from the author.

posts.title: 3 Ways You Destroy Your Child's Self-Esteem Without Knowing It
posts.markdown: Instilling confidence in a child can be difficult at times. Their brains work in such a way that we often forget that the words we choose to say to them, and the actions we perform in front of them, will leave a lasting mark, be it good or bad. Before letting loose a common remark that you’d say to a friend, think about the true implications of what you’re saying or doing.  Try to think about how you’re interacting with your child, and whether it is helping them grow their self-esteem or discouraging them.   Here are three ways you will unknowingly lower your child’s self-esteem: **Telling them “it’s easy” – **This one is probably pretty obvious when viewed at face-value.  You wouldn’t feel very good about yourself if someone told you that the task you were struggling to complete was *easy*.  Ok, if it’s easy, then that must mean that I am somehow incompetent. This is exactly what your child thinks when you try to encourage them by letting them know how easy something is.  Instead, practice telling them that the tasks they struggle with are difficult or hard.  That way, when they finally achieve their task, they feel a sense of accomplishment and work ethic. **Doing everything for them – **One of the biggest things I wish my mom did for me as a kid is let me struggle and fail more often.  When children are faced with tasks and are then able to figure them out and solve them on their own, they feel a great sense of accomplishment.  Letting them learn how to fail, re-assess, and then succeed all by themselves is great for their self-esteem. Doing things for them takes away this opportunity for growth.  If the task at hand truly is too difficult, try reducing it into several, smaller tasks that they might be able to handle better. **Losing your cool when they make mistakes – **Just like Lewis’ Aunt Billie says in the Disney film ***[Meet the Robinsons](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0396555/)***, “[**From failure we learn, from success not so much**.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TNXr5Alytg4)”  Having a natural inclination to protect your children from all of the mistakes they are inevitably going to make throughout their lifetime is a surefire way to handicap them for life.   Your child is going to make mistakes in life, a lot of them, just like you did when you were young, and like you *continue to do* as an adult.  Never freak out when your kids make mistakes, recognize that they are opportunities to grow, and teach them how to be responsible, accountable, and honest (with themselves and those around them).
posts.html:
Instilling confidence in a child can be difficult at times. Their brains work in such a way that we often forget that the words we choose to say to them, and the actions we perform in front of them, will leave a lasting mark, be it good or bad.

Before letting loose a common remark that you’d say to a friend, think about the true implications of what you’re saying or doing.  Try to think about how you’re interacting with your child, and whether it is helping them grow their self-esteem or discouraging them.  

Here are three ways you will unknowingly lower your child’s self-esteem:

*Telling them “it’s easy” – *This one is probably pretty obvious when viewed at face-value.  You wouldn’t feel very good about yourself if someone told you that the task you were struggling to complete was easy.  Ok, if it’s easy, then that must mean that I am somehow incompetent.

This is exactly what your child thinks when you try to encourage them by letting them know how easy something is.  Instead, practice telling them that the tasks they struggle with are difficult or hard.  That way, when they finally achieve their task, they feel a sense of accomplishment and work ethic.

*Doing everything for them – *One of the biggest things I wish my mom did for me as a kid is let me struggle and fail more often.  When children are faced with tasks and are then able to figure them out and solve them on their own, they feel a great sense of accomplishment.  Letting them learn how to fail, re-assess, and then succeed all by themselves is great for their self-esteem.

Doing things for them takes away this opportunity for growth.  If the task at hand truly is too difficult, try reducing it into several, smaller tasks that they might be able to handle better.

Losing your cool when they make mistakes – *Just like Lewis’ Aunt Billie says in the Disney film Meet the Robinsons, “From failure we learn, from success not so much*.”  Having a natural inclination to protect your children from all of the mistakes they are inevitably going to make throughout their lifetime is a surefire way to handicap them for life.  

Your child is going to make mistakes in life, a lot of them, just like you did when you were young, and like you continue to do as an adult.  Never freak out when your kids make mistakes, recognize that they are opportunities to grow, and teach them how to be responsible, accountable, and honest (with themselves and those around them).

posts.title: 5 Things to Know Before Dating a Scorpio
posts.markdown: The Scorpio is known for being a mysterious and passionate creature.  They always trust their hearts and tend to be fairly confident individuals.  Falling for a Scorpio is easy because they’re exciting people.  But the Scorpio is easily swayed when it comes to matters of the heart; they tend to take the emotional path over the rational path, which can sometimes lead to confusion and unintended pain for their partners. So, here are five things to know about the Scorpio before committing to anything: **They can be intense – **The Scorpio is at the top of the intensity scale when compared to the other signs of the Zodiac.  When they take on a task or have a mission, it’s all or nothing.   **They tend to be self-destructive – **As the sign of the alchemist, the Scorpio revels in death and rebirth.  Because of this, they are not afraid to break down different aspects of themselves and start over new.  While it might seem like the Scorpio is destroying itself, it’s really breaking down so that they can build back up with increased fortification. **They can be introverted – **Depending on their energy at the time, the Scorpio ebbs and flows between being incredibly introverted and incredibly extroverted.  During vibrational highs, the Scorpio enjoys being in the spotlight, but when this energy drops they tend to become reclusive.  However, they’re natural charmers, having no trouble conversing with everyone. **They’re stubborn – **Following with the all-or-nothing mentality, the Scorpio becomes entirely focused once committing to something.  This leads to a form of tunnel vision in which they can’t see outside of what they’re doing.  Especially when they feel attacked, the Scorpio will bunker down and root themselves to something solid.  To bring them back to reality, they need a partner’s calm and composure. **They are incredibly sexual – **If you’ve ever been with a Scorpio then you already know this probably, but the Scorpio is dynamite in the sack.  Being able to take the routine and ordinary to the next level is what they are all about.  They approach lovemaking with a spiritual, sensual and creative vibe which allows them to transcend normal boundaries.  However, the opposite is true as well.  If they want nothing to do with you then they can shut everything down just as easily as it was turned on.

posts.title: Watch What Happens When She Starts Speaking to Animals, I'm Speechless!
posts.markdown: I would venture to guess that everyone has, at some point in their life (probably when we were kids), wished they could speak to animals.  I know I did.  How could you not?  Animals are our furry best friends that give us curious looks when we speak to them.  If they could, what do you think they would say back to us?   A woman by the name of Anna Breytenbach is here to tell us what it’s like.  As an inter-species communicator, Anna is believed, by some, to be the key to the evolution of humanity (and ultimately, the planet).   Anna’s ability to communicate with animals allows her to empathize with them, to really understand their wishes and desires and emotions. One illustration of Anna’s tremendous capabilities comes from her interaction with a deadly black leopard.  This particular jungle cat, who was dubbed ‘Diablo’, had become aggressive and angry after being moved to a new location.  His trainers, unable to figure out how to bring this cat back to his former self, brought in Anna to see if she could talk some sense into him. Filled with doubt at first, the trainers couldn’t believe what they were seeing (or hearing) as Anna talked to Diablo, and explained to his trainers why he was so upset.  After making a few changes and communicating with Diablo, this jungle cat was finally calmed; Anna had brought him back to a peaceful place. Check out this full-length (52 minutes) documentary on the art of animal communication when you get the chance.  In the meantime, watch this short video about Anna’s encounter with Diablo, the black leopard.  Photo source: **[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T2vhV63lx2k)**

posts.title: Different Anxieties and Stress Triggers for Each Zodiac Sign and How to Deal With Them
posts.markdown: **Aries** You enjoy having tons of Ram energy throughout your day, but as it fades, you find yourself feeling exposed or vulnerable.  The Aries is constantly trying to accomplish all their goals as fast as they can, which is why they often forget to take time out of their day to simply do nothing.  Taking time for yourself is the best way to reduce stress and feel less overwhelmed by all things you want to do. **Taurus** The Taurus enjoys doing things smart and right, as the last thing they want is to come off as incompetent.  This can lead you to being anxious about time constraints and deadlines.   You also tend to stress about personal conflicts, whether you hurt someone’s feelings or can’t find a resolution to a fight; trust your gut and go with your instincts, they’ll guide you in the right direction. **Gemini** The Gemini dislikes people who are visibly dull or foolish.  Tiny things like grammar and conventional spelling errors grind your gears more than anything and you hate boring people.  The Gemini benefits well from consistent brain-stimulating activities. **Cancer** The crab hates feeling unsafe or insecure.  So, they like to put up a tough exterior in order to deflect any suspicion that they’re deeply affected by what others say about them or strong criticisms.  Don’t be afraid to let people know how you feel instead of ignoring your feelings.  Breathe deeply, feeling it in your stomach, as that’s where you feel most safe. **Leo** Leos stress out a lot when they find themselves out of control and not knowing what to do.  They also hate losing things and not being able to find them.  Love makes the Leo act the most crazy, turning the King of the Jungle into an insecure, mess of a person.  Leos, you just need to accept what is happening in your life, and let it be. **Virgo** Virgos, in order to reduce the stress in your life, you need to stop thinking so much.  Don’t be afraid to try new things, even though the thought of stepping out of the comfort zone can be terrifying.  Visualize yourself overcoming the obstacles in your life, trust that you’re in the right place and stay positive. **Libra** Libras value fairness quite a bit, so when they feel they’re getting the short end of the stick, they’re not at all happy about it.  If you want to confront someone, do it in a calm and composed manner, don’t let yourself brood for days and then blow up on someone.  Keep it sweet and to the point, let people know what your stance is on the matter. **Scorpio** The Scorpio is a sensitive being, but they are able to hide it well.  The Scorpio’s strength is subtle, meaning you’re not a fan of loudness or noise and you enjoy having privacy.  Allow people to know your boundaries and needs so that a winning solution for everyone can be reached. **Sagittarius** The Sagittarius hates stagnation, so you’re prone to absolutely hating traffic.  You don’t enjoy any activities where you have to be on your best behavior to please someone else.  Stress in your life derives mainly from work or your partner as they seemingly demand things from your constantly.  Take the time to be outside, so as to free your restless spirit every now and then. **Capricorn** The Capricorn sets high expectations for itself, and you feel pressure to succeed when you fail to reach your goals.  Never waste your time in self-loathing or deep contemplation about what you could have done different, etc.  Live in the moment and find time everyday to relax and decompress. **Aquarius** The Aquarius often feels pressed for time as there’s simply not enough of it in the day.  They like having things their way and dislike those who try to pressure them into doing things.  If you slow down just a little bit, you’ll find it’s actually easier to accomplish more, and you can be relaxed while doing so. **Pisces** The Pisces is known for being a private creature.  Any situations that leave you feeling vulnerable or exposed will be stressful.  Invasions of privacy or space can leave you feeling ill, as does a loud environment.  Be sure to find time to spend alone, as this will give you the space needed to sort through emotions and conflicts.
posts.html:
Aries

You enjoy having tons of Ram energy throughout your day, but as it fades, you find yourself feeling exposed or vulnerable.  The Aries is constantly trying to accomplish all their goals as fast as they can, which is why they often forget to take time out of their day to simply do nothing.  Taking time for yourself is the best way to reduce stress and feel less overwhelmed by all things you want to do.

Taurus

The Taurus enjoys doing things smart and right, as the last thing they want is to come off as incompetent.  This can lead you to being anxious about time constraints and deadlines.  

You also tend to stress about personal conflicts, whether you hurt someone’s feelings or can’t find a resolution to a fight; trust your gut and go with your instincts, they’ll guide you in the right direction.

Gemini

The Gemini dislikes people who are visibly dull or foolish.  Tiny things like grammar and conventional spelling errors grind your gears more than anything and you hate boring people.  The Gemini benefits well from consistent brain-stimulating activities.

Cancer

The crab hates feeling unsafe or insecure.  So, they like to put up a tough exterior in order to deflect any suspicion that they’re deeply affected by what others say about them or strong criticisms.  Don’t be afraid to let people know how you feel instead of ignoring your feelings.  Breathe deeply, feeling it in your stomach, as that’s where you feel most safe.

Leo

Leos stress out a lot when they find themselves out of control and not knowing what to do.  They also hate losing things and not being able to find them.  Love makes the Leo act the most crazy, turning the King of the Jungle into an insecure, mess of a person.  Leos, you just need to accept what is happening in your life, and let it be.

Virgo

Virgos, in order to reduce the stress in your life, you need to stop thinking so much.  Don’t be afraid to try new things, even though the thought of stepping out of the comfort zone can be terrifying.  Visualize yourself overcoming the obstacles in your life, trust that you’re in the right place and stay positive.

Libra

Libras value fairness quite a bit, so when they feel they’re getting the short end of the stick, they’re not at all happy about it.  If you want to confront someone, do it in a calm and composed manner, don’t let yourself brood for days and then blow up on someone.  Keep it sweet and to the point, let people know what your stance is on the matter.

Scorpio

The Scorpio is a sensitive being, but they are able to hide it well.  The Scorpio’s strength is subtle, meaning you’re not a fan of loudness or noise and you enjoy having privacy.  Allow people to know your boundaries and needs so that a winning solution for everyone can be reached.

Sagittarius

The Sagittarius hates stagnation, so you’re prone to absolutely hating traffic.  You don’t enjoy any activities where you have to be on your best behavior to please someone else.  Stress in your life derives mainly from work or your partner as they seemingly demand things from your constantly.  Take the time to be outside, so as to free your restless spirit every now and then.

Capricorn

The Capricorn sets high expectations for itself, and you feel pressure to succeed when you fail to reach your goals.  Never waste your time in self-loathing or deep contemplation about what you could have done different, etc.  Live in the moment and find time everyday to relax and decompress.

Aquarius

The Aquarius often feels pressed for time as there’s simply not enough of it in the day.  They like having things their way and dislike those who try to pressure them into doing things.  If you slow down just a little bit, you’ll find it’s actually easier to accomplish more, and you can be relaxed while doing so.

Pisces

The Pisces is known for being a private creature.  Any situations that leave you feeling vulnerable or exposed will be stressful.  Invasions of privacy or space can leave you feeling ill, as does a loud environment.  Be sure to find time to spend alone, as this will give you the space needed to sort through emotions and conflicts.

posts.title: 5 Things That Lower Your Vibration and What To Do About Them
posts.markdown: Everything that exists today is made of energy.  The different energies in the world all vibrate at different frequencies, with the Earth vibrating at around 528 MHz.  528 MHz has been dubbed the frequency of peace and love, and is the same frequency that John Lennon recorded his song “Imagine” in. In humans, anyone vibrating above 500 MHz has found the frequency of love, and anyone below 500 MHz suffers from negative and fearful thoughts and behaviors. Low energetic vibrations can cause a variety of different problems for the body, the mind and the spirit.  **Here are five things that lower your vibrational energy and how to get rid of them:** **People who bring negativity into your life** This could be anyone, your friends, coworkers, family members, etc.  Get rid of any person who is constantly grumpy, whiny, or negative, as all they’re doing is bringing your vibration down.  Protect your energy from these types of people. **Watching violence** As entertaining as it may be, engaging with violent sports like boxing and MMA lowers our vibrational energy.  Cutting out any sort of violent entertainment will help protect your energy levels.  The same goes for any films or series that feature a lot of blood, gore and violent scenes. **Electro Magnetic Frequencies (EMFs)** Devices like cell phones, computers, televisions, and other electronic devices can all affect your vibrational energy.  Try to limit your exposure to these things to protect yourself. **Negative speech** When we judge and criticize others, we are effectively lowering our own vibrational energy.  Try to keep your speech, thoughts, and actions positive, no matter what happens. **Holding a grudge** Practice forgiving others and letting things go.  Holding onto negative energies of the past is one of the easiest ways to lower your vibration.  This is a bad idea; when we do this, it negatively affects our heart, lungs and circulatory system.

In humans, anyone vibrating above 500 MHz has found the frequency of love, and anyone below 500 MHz suffers from negative and fearful thoughts and behaviors.

Low energetic vibrations can cause a variety of different problems for the body, the mind and the spirit.  Here are five things that lower your vibrational energy and how to get rid of them:

People who bring negativity into your life

This could be anyone, your friends, coworkers, family members, etc.  Get rid of any person who is constantly grumpy, whiny, or negative, as all they’re doing is bringing your vibration down.  Protect your energy from these types of people.

Watching violence

As entertaining as it may be, engaging with violent sports like boxing and MMA lowers our vibrational energy.  Cutting out any sort of violent entertainment will help protect your energy levels.  The same goes for any films or series that feature a lot of blood, gore and violent scenes.

Electro Magnetic Frequencies (EMFs)

Devices like cell phones, computers, televisions, and other electronic devices can all affect your vibrational energy.  Try to limit your exposure to these things to protect yourself.

Negative speech

When we judge and criticize others, we are effectively lowering our own vibrational energy.  Try to keep your speech, thoughts, and actions positive, no matter what happens.

Holding a grudge

Practice forgiving others and letting things go.  Holding onto negative energies of the past is one of the easiest ways to lower your vibration.  This is a bad idea; when we do this, it negatively affects our heart, lungs and circulatory system.

posts.title: Do Your Heart Lines on Your Palms Match? This Is What It Might Mean...
posts.markdown: Reading one’s palms is considered to be an ancient and mystical practice.  You may have a family member or friend who loves to read people’s palms and hands.  It can be fun, predicting the future and fortune of those you call friends and family.  Will I have a great life? How many kids will I have? Will I ever find someone to love? Everything, really. Palm reading originated in India and spread through Asia, Europe and North America.  Notable people who have shown interest in palm reading are Alexander the Great and Aristotle. One of the major points in palm reading is the heart line.  You can find it below the base of your fingers.  The first step is to place your hands side by side like in this photo.  Do they match?  Are they touching?  Are they crooked?  Keep this picture in your head as you read through these: **There are 3 formations** **If the right palm heart line is higher than the left palm heart line, it means that you are wise beyond your years as well as a good lover.  You enjoy living freely without worrying about what others think about you.**   **If the left plam heart line is higher than the right palm heart line, it means that you are the independent one.  You don’t require love to be complete, you enjoy every challenge, but searching for love is not your top priority.**   **When they match it means that you have a nurturing personality.  You enjoy having things just the way they are and you make a great parent.** This video also helps explain a bit:
posts.html:

How many kids will I have? Will I ever find someone to love? Everything, really.

Palm reading originated in India and spread through Asia, Europe and North America.  Notable people who have shown interest in palm reading are Alexander the Great and Aristotle.

One of the major points in palm reading is the heart line.  You can find it below the base of your fingers.  The first step is to place your hands side by side like in this photo.  Do they match?  Are they touching?  Are they crooked?  Keep this picture in your head as you read through these:

There are 3 formations

If the right palm heart line is higher than the left palm heart line, it means that you are wise beyond your years as well as a good lover.  You enjoy living freely without worrying about what others think about you.

If the left plam heart line is higher than the right palm heart line, it means that you are the independent one.  You don’t require love to be complete, you enjoy every challenge, but searching for love is not your top priority.

When they match it means that you have a nurturing personality.  You enjoy having things just the way they are and you make a great parent.

posts.title: DMCA Removal
posts.markdown:
Heart Centered Rebalancing (*“Company”)* has adopted the following policy toward copyright infringement in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (**[http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf](http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf)**). The address of the Designated Agent to Receive Notification of Claimed Infringement (“Designated Agent”) is listed at the end of this policy.

**This is information for anyone that wishes to challenge our *“fair use”* of copyrighted material.**

*Many of the stories on this site contain copyrighted material whose use has not been specifically authorized by the copyright owner. We are making this material available in an effort to advance the understanding of environmental issues, human rights, economic and political democracy, science and technology, health, issues of social justice, and other certain conscious knowledge. *

Fair use: *Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for “fair use” for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational, or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use.*

We believe that because we are a news/education/research website, that our use of such copyrighted material falls under *“fair use”*.

If you are a legal copyright holder or a designated agent for such and you believe that content residing on or accessible through our website infringes a copyright and falls outside the boundaries of *“Fair Use”*, please send a notice of infringement by contacting us at: **[hcrebalancing@gmail.com](mailto:hcrebalancing@gmail.com)**

***We will respond and take necessary action immediately.***

If notice is given of an alleged copyright violation we will act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material(s) in question.

We believe in the free-flow of information, and this site may feature content that is not created by us,*** including articles, videos, and images. All 3rd party material posted on this website is copyright to the respective owners/authors. heartcenteredrebalancing.com makes no claim of copyright on such material.***


## Heart Centered Rebalancing – DMCA COPYRIGHT POLICY

### Reporting Copyright Infringement:

If you allege that your intellectual property is being violated, you must submit to the Company:

1. A physical or electronic notification from a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright that has been allegedly infringed;
2. Identification of the works or materials being infringed;
3. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing including information regarding the specific location of the infringing materials on the Company’s website that the copyright owner seeks to have removed, with sufficient detail so that Company is capable of finding and verifying its existence;
4. Contact information of the person notifying the Company, including address, telephone number and, if available, e-mail address;
5. A statement that the notifier has a good faith belief that the material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; and
6. A statement made under penalty of perjury that the information provided is accurate and the notifying party is authorized to make the complaint on behalf of the copyright owner.

### Once Proper Bona Fide Infringement Notification is Received by the Designated Agent:

It is Company’s policy:

1. to remove or disable access to the infringing material;
2. to notify the content provider, member or user that it has removed or disabled access to the material; and
3. that repeat offenders will have the infringing material removed from the system and that the Company will terminate any such originating content provider’s, member’s or user’s access to our service.

Please contact the Company following the above procedures at: **[hcrebalancing@gmail.com](mailto:hcrebalancing@gmail.com)**

posts.title: What Your Zodiac Sign Says About How You Express Anger
posts.markdown: Everyone likes to express their disappointments, frustrations and anger in different ways.  Maybe you’re the type to sit in the corner and brood or maybe you’re the type to start yelling and causing a big scene.   Anger is multi-faceted emotion and there are endless ways to express it.  But your Zodiac sign also has a lot to say about how you handle yourself when you’re feeling pissed off. Here is each Zodiac sign’s way of expressing anger: **Aries (March 21 – April 19) | Temper tantrums** Aries are notorious for being firecrackers, and when it comes to anger, they’re prone to sudden outbursts.  They don’t like to sugarcoat things for anyone, so if they’re upset with you, you’ll know about it. **Taurus (April 20 – May 20) | Build up and explode** The Taurus is a dangerous person to upset, as they won’t initially let you know that they’re mad at you.  They let their emotions simmer, subtly trying to give hints that you’ve upset them before letting all of their boiling anger come flowing out like an erupting volcano. **Gemini (May 21 – June 20) | Verbal expression** Because Geminis are so obsessed with talking, it should come as no surprise that their anger is unleashed via their sharp tongues.  They like to scream, shout and throw insults that cut to the very core of a person’s being. **Cancer (June 21 – July 22) | Kind of all over the place** The Cancer doesn’t openly express their anger until they’ve taken all that they can handle.  First they sulk, then they become passive-aggressive, and then they become reclusive.  If no one has taken the time to try and remedy this situation, they go from crying to intense outbursts of anger. **Leo (July 23 – August 22) | RAAAWR!** The Leo is quite apt at expressing anger.  When they’re pissed off, they love to shout and yell while becoming an intense storm of anger and fury.  They swear like sailors and use vulgar language during their outbursts. **Virgo (August 23 – September 22) | Brood and brood** Virgos don’t particularly enjoy letting their anger out, so what usually happens is they hold all of it in for as long as they can until something tiny lights their fuse, blowing them into orbit.  Their anger is usually never about something immediate that happened, but rather something that happened long ago. **Libra (September 23 – October 22) | Seething behind the scenes** Libras despise confrontation and hate showing their anger because they think it makes them less attractive.  They try not to let their angry emotions get to them, but sometimes they do and they will lose their cool. **Scorpio (October 23 – November 21) | We are the fury** It takes a lot to get the Scorpio fired up, but should you somehow achieve this feat, be prepared for a venomous wrath.  Scorpios are adept at destroying a person with verbal onslaughts and looks that could kill, and they’re not quick to forgive or forget what you’ve done. **Sagittarius (November 22 – December 21) | One big ball of fire** The Sagittarius has no fear of turning it up to 11.  If you piss them off they’ll get rid of you in a heartbeat.  Try to distract them from their anger, as they will often lose sight of why they were even upset in the first place. **Capricorn (December 22 – January 19) | Destroy everything you touch** The Capricorn isn’t likely to express anger until their threshold has been reached.  Once it has been reached though, they’re likely to want to break something, like the spirit of the person who has wronged them or that lamp in the corner over there.   **Aquarius (January 20 – February 18) | Let it go, let it gooo** If the Sagittarius has no chill, then the Aquarius has all of the chill.  When they’re upset they’ll simply disengage with everyone around them and go for a drive, or walk around for a bit until they’re not upset anymore.  If they can’t seem to let it go, they’ll eventually lose their temper and dump all of their negative emotions on you. **Pisces (February 19 – March) | Up, down and all around** Pisces aren’t ones to typically get very angry, which makes it all the worse when they finally do.  However, the only person they ever seem to get upset with is themselves.  Their rage includes violent, self-destructive behaviors, often requiring a bit of healing after they’re done with an outburst.
posts.html:
Everyone likes to express their disappointments, frustrations and anger in different ways.  Maybe you’re the type to sit in the corner and brood or maybe you’re the type to start yelling and causing a big scene.  

Anger is multi-faceted emotion and there are endless ways to express it.  But your Zodiac sign also has a lot to say about how you handle yourself when you’re feeling pissed off.

Here is each Zodiac sign’s way of expressing anger:

Aries (March 21 – April 19) | Temper tantrums

Aries are notorious for being firecrackers, and when it comes to anger, they’re prone to sudden outbursts.  They don’t like to sugarcoat things for anyone, so if they’re upset with you, you’ll know about it.

Taurus (April 20 – May 20) | Build up and explode

The Taurus is a dangerous person to upset, as they won’t initially let you know that they’re mad at you.  They let their emotions simmer, subtly trying to give hints that you’ve upset them before letting all of their boiling anger come flowing out like an erupting volcano.

Gemini (May 21 – June 20) | Verbal expression

Because Geminis are so obsessed with talking, it should come as no surprise that their anger is unleashed via their sharp tongues.  They like to scream, shout and throw insults that cut to the very core of a person’s being.

Cancer (June 21 – July 22) | Kind of all over the place

The Cancer doesn’t openly express their anger until they’ve taken all that they can handle.  First they sulk, then they become passive-aggressive, and then they become reclusive.  If no one has taken the time to try and remedy this situation, they go from crying to intense outbursts of anger.

Leo (July 23 – August 22) | RAAAWR!

The Leo is quite apt at expressing anger.  When they’re pissed off, they love to shout and yell while becoming an intense storm of anger and fury.  They swear like sailors and use vulgar language during their outbursts.

Virgo (August 23 – September 22) | Brood and brood

Virgos don’t particularly enjoy letting their anger out, so what usually happens is they hold all of it in for as long as they can until something tiny lights their fuse, blowing them into orbit.  Their anger is usually never about something immediate that happened, but rather something that happened long ago.

Libra (September 23 – October 22) | Seething behind the scenes

Libras despise confrontation and hate showing their anger because they think it makes them less attractive.  They try not to let their angry emotions get to them, but sometimes they do and they will lose their cool.

Scorpio (October 23 – November 21) | We are the fury

It takes a lot to get the Scorpio fired up, but should you somehow achieve this feat, be prepared for a venomous wrath.  Scorpios are adept at destroying a person with verbal onslaughts and looks that could kill, and they’re not quick to forgive or forget what you’ve done.

Sagittarius (November 22 – December 21) | One big ball of fire

The Sagittarius has no fear of turning it up to 11.  If you piss them off they’ll get rid of you in a heartbeat.  Try to distract them from their anger, as they will often lose sight of why they were even upset in the first place.

Capricorn (December 22 – January 19) | Destroy everything you touch

The Capricorn isn’t likely to express anger until their threshold has been reached.  Once it has been reached though, they’re likely to want to break something, like the spirit of the person who has wronged them or that lamp in the corner over there.  

Aquarius (January 20 – February 18) | Let it go, let it gooo

If the Sagittarius has no chill, then the Aquarius has all of the chill.  When they’re upset they’ll simply disengage with everyone around them and go for a drive, or walk around for a bit until they’re not upset anymore.  If they can’t seem to let it go, they’ll eventually lose their temper and dump all of their negative emotions on you.

Pisces (February 19 – March) | Up, down and all around

Pisces aren’t ones to typically get very angry, which makes it all the worse when they finally do.  However, the only person they ever seem to get upset with is themselves.  Their rage includes violent, self-destructive behaviors, often requiring a bit of healing after they’re done with an outburst.

posts.title: 5 Great Reasons to STOP Throwing Away Your Avocado Seeds
posts.markdown: The word ‘**[superfood](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superfood)**’ gets tossed around a lot these days to describe foods that are supposedly really healthy for you.  Avocado is one of the foods often mentioned and with good reason.   Not only is the fruit part of the avocado great for you, but the avocado seed is great for you as well.  Packed with a myriad of health benefits, try saving your avocado seeds next time you find yourself cutting into one, it might just save your life. Here are five great reasons to start saving and eating your avocado seeds: **Full of antioxidants** While the avocado fruit might get most of the attention, its seed is where 70 percent of its antioxidants are found.  **[These antioxidants](http://ajcn.nutrition.org/content/79/5/727.full)** help the body in a variety of different ways, including the neutralization of free radicals, which have ties to many different diseases as well as obesity. **High fiber content** The avocado seed has an incredibly **[high soluble fiber](http://www.webmd.com/diet/insoluble-soluble-fiber)** content, averaging more soluble fibers than most foods that exist on Earth today. **They can help ease digestion** In South America, the avocado seed has been used for several generations as a treatment solution for dysentery and gastrointestinal tract problems.  The seed helps reduce inflammation, prevent ulcers and can help get rid of constipation.  Additionally, it has antibacterial properties and helps fight viral diseases and infections. **Anti-cancer properties** Avocado seeds contain**[flavonol, which is a very strong antioxidant](http://nutrition.ucdavis.edu/content/infosheets/fact-pro-flavonol.pdf)** that helps prevent, and even reduce, tumor growth.  Science journal *Pharmaceutical Biology* found evidence that the avocado fruit, as well as its seed, helped rid the body of leukemia cells. **They’re good for [heart health](http://eatlocalgrown.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=14305:usda-wrong-about-cholesterol-and-fat&catid=35:articles&Itemid=148)** Because the avocado seed has high levels of dietary fiber, it’s a natural choice for lowering cholesterol because it stops cholesterol from being absorbed by the blood.  It has also been seen to reduce plaque, which is known to cause heart attacks and strokes.
posts.html:
The word ‘superfood’ gets tossed around a lot these days to describe foods that are supposedly really healthy for you.  Avocado is one of the foods often mentioned and with good reason.  

Not only is the fruit part of the avocado great for you, but the avocado seed is great for you as well.  Packed with a myriad of health benefits, try saving your avocado seeds next time you find yourself cutting into one, it might just save your life.

Here are five great reasons to start saving and eating your avocado seeds:

Full of antioxidants

While the avocado fruit might get most of the attention, its seed is where 70 percent of its antioxidants are found.  These antioxidants help the body in a variety of different ways, including the neutralization of free radicals, which have ties to many different diseases as well as obesity.

High fiber content

The avocado seed has an incredibly high soluble fiber content, averaging more soluble fibers than most foods that exist on Earth today.

They can help ease digestion

In South America, the avocado seed has been used for several generations as a treatment solution for dysentery and gastrointestinal tract problems.  The seed helps reduce inflammation, prevent ulcers and can help get rid of constipation.  Additionally, it has antibacterial properties and helps fight viral diseases and infections.

Anti-cancer properties

Avocado seeds containflavonol, which is a very strong antioxidant that helps prevent, and even reduce, tumor growth.  Science journal Pharmaceutical Biology found evidence that the avocado fruit, as well as its seed, helped rid the body of leukemia cells.

They’re good for heart health

Because the avocado seed has high levels of dietary fiber, it’s a natural choice for lowering cholesterol because it stops cholesterol from being absorbed by the blood.  It has also been seen to reduce plaque, which is known to cause heart attacks and strokes.

posts.title: How to Tell When Your Body Is Sending You a Psychic Message
posts.markdown: The human body is one of the best tools one can use to to help guide themselves through the ups and downs of life.  Our bodies speak to us, they’re constantly sending us messages and trying to tell us things.   It’s by far the biggest piece of psychic equipment that we own, and understanding how it works and how it affects our everyday world is important. Essentially, the human body acts as one giant antennae: it receives all sorts of signals, vibrations and signs that our physical senses traditionally do not pick up on.  Critical to the understanding of the human body’s psychic ability is the notion that our bodies are not just physical, in fact, they are largely spiritual, and they operate on two separate levels, unbeknownst to us.  It has been said that for every physical sense we have, we also possess a psychic sense that complements it. Being able to use our psychic abilities to reach into the spiritual world is a skill that anyone can learn, and there are classes one can take to help them succeed in this endeavor.  Using guided meditations, one can reach new vibrational heights, and many classes have students practice psychometry with each other, as they try to gain psychic information from different objects. They also include psychic and mediumship readings with the students themselves, having them try to link with another person’s loved ones, which is only possible by reaching new levels of receptivity. However, now that you know that your body is essentially one giant intuitive antennae, try to use it as such more often.  Throughout the course of your life you will be forced to make decisions, both big and small.  When you next find yourself in a position of decision-making, take a second to simply be; breathe deeply, calm your nerves, and listen to what your body is telling you to do.   This message from your body will manifest itself in different ways, whether it be a gut feeling, a shiver on the back, or a spontaneous emotion. One of the best ways to increase your awareness and receptivity is through meditation.  Recognize that your body is so much more than just a vessel for which to carry your soul and mind and become attuned with it.  You’ll start to find positive changes in your life because of it.
posts.html:
The human body is one of the best tools one can use to to help guide themselves through the ups and downs of life.  Our bodies speak to us, they’re constantly sending us messages and trying to tell us things.  

It’s by far the biggest piece of psychic equipment that we own, and understanding how it works and how it affects our everyday world is important.

Essentially, the human body acts as one giant antennae: it receives all sorts of signals, vibrations and signs that our physical senses traditionally do not pick up on.  Critical to the understanding of the human body’s psychic ability is the notion that our bodies are not just physical, in fact, they are largely spiritual, and they operate on two separate levels, unbeknownst to us.  It has been said that for every physical sense we have, we also possess a psychic sense that complements it.

Being able to use our psychic abilities to reach into the spiritual world is a skill that anyone can learn, and there are classes one can take to help them succeed in this endeavor.  Using guided meditations, one can reach new vibrational heights, and many classes have students practice psychometry with each other, as they try to gain psychic information from different objects.

They also include psychic and mediumship readings with the students themselves, having them try to link with another person’s loved ones, which is only possible by reaching new levels of receptivity.

However, now that you know that your body is essentially one giant intuitive antennae, try to use it as such more often.  Throughout the course of your life you will be forced to make decisions, both big and small.  When you next find yourself in a position of decision-making, take a second to simply be; breathe deeply, calm your nerves, and listen to what your body is telling you to do.  

This message from your body will manifest itself in different ways, whether it be a gut feeling, a shiver on the back, or a spontaneous emotion.

One of the best ways to increase your awareness and receptivity is through meditation.  Recognize that your body is so much more than just a vessel for which to carry your soul and mind and become attuned with it.  You’ll start to find positive changes in your life because of it.

posts.title: 5 Great Ways to Clear Negative Energy From Your Home
posts.markdown: Negative energies often accumulate in the spaces that we neglect and forget to take the time for.  Our homes like to reflect how the rest of our lives are doing, meaning if we’re in a poor place, our homes are likely to be as well.  Don’t let yourself become overwhelmed with negativity. Try these five easy tips for clearing out the negative energies in your home so you can start living a more positive lifestyle: **Make your space exist for you** As time goes by, many of us pick up lots of additional baggage that we might not want in our homes, but feel pressured to keep anyway because they are gifts or hold value for someone else.  If there’s anything in your home that you feel obligated to keep around, get rid of it.  Build a space that features only things that *you* want and like. **Try clapping in the corners** Stagnant energy is quickly gotten rid of by clapping in the corners of each room you want to affect.  Maybe there are certain spaces in your home that feel naturally depressed or stagnant, clap in their corners until you feel a shift in the energy. **Fix your broken things** If you’ve stopped using certain items in your home that you used to use all the time, but now can’t because they are broken, take the time to fix them.   If you can’t afford to fix everything immediately, no worries, just form a plan or have intentions to fix them once you can.  Doing your best always promotes positive energy. **Fill your kitchen with ‘good’** In the same way that your body starts to feel better once you’ve filled it largely with superfoods, nutrients and other healthy substances, your kitchen’s energy will do the same thing if you fill it with the things that are great for you.   Stock your kitchen with plant-based foods, unprocessed snacks, and pure pantry ingredients, and you’ll notice a huge difference in energy. **Do everything with love** It is widely believed that love has both effective and universal healing properties, so adding more of it to your life can only benefit you.  The most effective way to keep negative energy out of the home is to take the time to do the activities you love in your home.  It could be a quiet nook for reading, a master chef’s kitchen, or an outside patio that you relax on.   Removing all of the negative energy from one’s space allows for positive things to grow there instead, like love, peace, fun, health and prosperity. (h/t**[ Mind Body Green](http://www.mindbodygreen.com/0-24379/5-easy-ways-to-clear-your-home-of-negative-energy-now.html)**)
posts.html:
Negative energies often accumulate in the spaces that we neglect and forget to take the time for.  Our homes like to reflect how the rest of our lives are doing, meaning if we’re in a poor place, our homes are likely to be as well.  Don’t let yourself become overwhelmed with negativity.

Try these five easy tips for clearing out the negative energies in your home so you can start living a more positive lifestyle:

Make your space exist for you

As time goes by, many of us pick up lots of additional baggage that we might not want in our homes, but feel pressured to keep anyway because they are gifts or hold value for someone else.  If there’s anything in your home that you feel obligated to keep around, get rid of it.  Build a space that features only things that you want and like.

Try clapping in the corners

Stagnant energy is quickly gotten rid of by clapping in the corners of each room you want to affect.  Maybe there are certain spaces in your home that feel naturally depressed or stagnant, clap in their corners until you feel a shift in the energy.

Fix your broken things

If you’ve stopped using certain items in your home that you used to use all the time, but now can’t because they are broken, take the time to fix them.  

If you can’t afford to fix everything immediately, no worries, just form a plan or have intentions to fix them once you can.  Doing your best always promotes positive energy.

Fill your kitchen with ‘good’

In the same way that your body starts to feel better once you’ve filled it largely with superfoods, nutrients and other healthy substances, your kitchen’s energy will do the same thing if you fill it with the things that are great for you.  

Stock your kitchen with plant-based foods, unprocessed snacks, and pure pantry ingredients, and you’ll notice a huge difference in energy.

Do everything with love

It is widely believed that love has both effective and universal healing properties, so adding more of it to your life can only benefit you.  The most effective way to keep negative energy out of the home is to take the time to do the activities you love in your home.  It could be a quiet nook for reading, a master chef’s kitchen, or an outside patio that you relax on.  

Removing all of the negative energy from one’s space allows for positive things to grow there instead, like love, peace, fun, health and prosperity.

(h/t Mind Body Green)

posts.title: What Your Chinese Zodiac Sign Says About You
posts.markdown: Find your birth year on the chart above to see which animal is associated with your birth year, then read below to see which characteristics you inherit from your Chinese Zodiac sign: **Rats – **Rats are charming and thoughtful individuals, touting strong and vivid imaginations, and generosity in relationships that are important to them.  They can be quick-tempered and critical, but are typically at ease when in company and social settings.  They’re usually quite intellectual and enjoy notable popularity. **Ox – **The Ox is known for being stoic and strong.  They face adversity head on and inspire confidence in others.  They handle their responsibilities methodically and often garner respect because of it.  They can come off as arrogant at times because they defend their interests with extreme determination, but this same determination is admirable as it founded in a sense of duty. **Tigers – **The Tiger is highly sensitive and often turns to its emotions, allowing it to love deeply.  The Tiger needs to find the balance between their need for love, their strong competitive spirit, and their desire to dominate.  They’re well-suited for leadership, as they courageously face any and all challenges. **Rabbits / Hare – **Rabbits are well-liked people because of their affectionate and courteous nature.  They dislike drama, preferring to stay out of it.  They focus mainly on pursuits that make them happy, and would never deliberately hurt anyone.  Despite their fun-loving nature, they are usually quiet and reserved. **Dragons – **Dragons are vibrant with energy and demonstrate a great charismatic presence, which can often come off as boisterous and loud occasionally.  They’re very talented people due to their high intelligence.  They enjoy demanding situations that provide them with opportunity to use all of their energies and talents to succeed. **Snakes – **Snakes are known for their wisdom and ability for profound thought.  They’re also quite charming and romantic.  Despite this quality for love, they are often loners and prefer secrecy.  This leads many snakes to be less socially popular than their peers, but that’s ok because the snake prefers its own company. **Horses – **Horse people prefer independence and hard work, which is often revealed in their characteristic egotism.  They possess great verbal acuity and a high intellectual capacity, however, providing them with the opportunity to be quite popular.  They will commit to hard work and success as long as the work they are doing is not seen as beneath them. **Sheep – **Sheep are charming and likable folks, even if they are reserved.  A sheep person possesses a love for nature, art, and culture, and often commands a great deal of creativity themselves.  They can be timid, but are generally self-confident.  They are most fulfilled when in a relationship that provides security. **Monkeys – **Intelligent and energetic, the Monkey touts a magnetic
