posts.title: 5 Best Plants to Grow Indoors for Air Purification
posts.markdown: If you’re like me and like to spend a great deal of your time being outside, surrounded by nature, you can bring a bit of that feeling into your home with the introduction of flora.  Plants in the home provide numerous benefits and they make any empty space look better. Studies have even found that bringing fresh greenery into your abode helps **[decrease stress](http://www.aarp.org/politics-society/advocacy/info-07-2012/health-benefits-of-nature.html)**, lessen **[tension](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18329704)** and promote healing. Place a few of these plants around your home and reap the rewards of having a bit of nature in your life. **The Aloe Plant (shown above)** Aloe is notorious for its use in relieving sunburns, stings, and cuts.  Just as it helps detox our bodies, it also helps detox the air. ** [Air pollutants](http://www.aloearborescens.org/phocadownload/aloe%20health%20efficacy.pdf)**stemming from cleaning products with chemicals are Aloe’s specialty.   And, aloe acts somewhat like a pollution meter, as its leaves will show **[brown spots](http://www.aloearborescens.org/phocadownload/aloe%20health%20efficacy.pdf)** when pollution levels are high. **English Ivy** ![English_Ivy_(Hedera_helix)](http://ta1.universaltelegra.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/English_Ivy_Hedera_helix.jpg) **[NASA](http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2009/02/10/nasas-guide-to-the-best-p_n_165588.html)** released a guide for the best houseplants to grow indoors because of their filtering abilities and English Ivy topped the list.  It is believed to be the best at absorbing formaldehyde, can be hung or put on the ground, only needs moderate levels of sunlight and is incredibly easy to grow. **Rubber Tree** ![HK_Sheung_Wan_18_Po_Hing_Fong_barber_shop_Ficus_elastica_Indian_rubber_tree_Aug-2012](http://ta1.universaltelegra.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/HK_Sheung_Wan_18_Po_Hing_Fong_barber_shop_Ficus_elastica_Indian_rubber_tree_Aug-2012.jpg) Rubber tree is a great plant to start with because it does well in dimly lit areas and cold climates.  It’s a very low maintenance plant that provides is still capable of providing all of the air purification benefits of the other plants. **Snake Plant** ![Snake_Plant_(Sansevieria_trifasciata_'Laurentii')](http://ta1.universaltelegra.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Snake_Plant_Sansevieria_trifasciata_Laurentii.jpg) Snake plant has the capacity to thrive with low levels of water and sunlight.  It’s incredibly efficient at absorbing carbon dioxide, and unlike other plants, it releases oxygen at night.  This makes the snake plant perfect for those wanting a better night’s rest. **Peace Lily** ![800px-Peace_Lily](http://ta1.universaltelegra.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/800px-Peace_Lily.jpg) If you prefer flowers in your home, Peace Lily might be the choice for you.  This gorgeous flower is low maintenance, does well in shaded areas and cooler temperatures, and have been seen to help reduce the amount of toxins found in the air.
posts.html:
If you’re like me and like to spend a great deal of your time being outside, surrounded by nature, you can bring a bit of that feeling into your home with the introduction of flora.  Plants in the home provide numerous benefits and they make any empty space look better.

Studies have even found that bringing fresh greenery into your abode helps decrease stress, lessen tension and promote healing.

Place a few of these plants around your home and reap the rewards of having a bit of nature in your life.

The Aloe Plant (shown above)

Aloe is notorious for its use in relieving sunburns, stings, and cuts.  Just as it helps detox our bodies, it also helps detox the air. * Air pollutants*stemming from cleaning products with chemicals are Aloe’s specialty.  

And, aloe acts somewhat like a pollution meter, as its leaves will show brown spots when pollution levels are high.

English Ivy

NASA released a guide for the best houseplants to grow indoors because of their filtering abilities and English Ivy topped the list.  It is believed to be the best at absorbing formaldehyde, can be hung or put on the ground, only needs moderate levels of sunlight and is incredibly easy to grow.

Rubber Tree

Rubber tree is a great plant to start with because it does well in dimly lit areas and cold climates.  It’s a very low maintenance plant that provides is still capable of providing all of the air purification benefits of the other plants.

Snake Plant

Snake plant has the capacity to thrive with low levels of water and sunlight.  It’s incredibly efficient at absorbing carbon dioxide, and unlike other plants, it releases oxygen at night.  This makes the snake plant perfect for those wanting a better night’s rest.

Peace Lily

If you prefer flowers in your home, Peace Lily might be the choice for you.  This gorgeous flower is low maintenance, does well in shaded areas and cooler temperatures, and have been seen to help reduce the amount of toxins found in the air.

posts.title: 20 Things to Do at Bedtime (To Raise Your Vibration!)
posts.markdown: By [**Andrea Schulman**](https://www.facebook.com/raiseyourvibrationtoday/?fref=ts) | [**Raise Your Vibration Today **](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/2016/06/28/things-to-do-at-bedtime-vibration/) Did you know that bedtime is an awesome opportunity to**[raise your vibration](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/ "Raise Your Vibration Today")** and to set yourself up for more positive manifestations? While we sleep we disconnect our consciousness from the physical world and instead we connect more deeply with our higher self. This connection helps us create with greater ease. There’s a reason why people tell you to “sleep on it” when you have a big decision-in our dream state we gain clarity and understanding.  We are awesome creators from our sleeping state! In addition to helping us solve our problems and deliberately create, sleep makes us feel good, boosts our immunity, and helps us heal from injury and illness.  So, whenever it’s possible, it’s a good idea to take advantage of sleep. Here are 20 things you can do at bedtime to raise your vibration and become a better deliberate creator.  Enjoy! ## Bedtime DOs: 1. Do give big hugs to the people you love before bedtime, if you live with them 🙂 2. After a rough day, do take a shower or bath before bedtime to wash off the stress and elevate your vibration before drifting off. 3. Do get some water to put on your nightstand. Sometimes at night we get thirsty, and we always feel better when we’re hydrated. 4. Do take a moment to snuggle into bed, and appreciate how comfortable your bedding and pajamas are. 5. Do spend a few moments appreciating what went well during the day. 6. Do ask a question of the universe before bed. We get lots of clarity from the dream state. You could ask something like “what should I do about that problem at work?” or “what kind of present would my best friend love for her birthday?” 7. Do set your intention to enjoy the next day. 8. Do create a peaceful atmosphere in your bedroom. Peaceful places inspire peaceful feelings. 9. If you like to watch television before bedtime, do be mindful of the programming you select. When we sleep, we often dwell on our last thoughts of the day, so be sure to select programming that’s light and* makes you feel good.* 10. Do close the blinds or invest in heavy curtains if you want to sleep in the next day.  The light of day is hard to ignore when it’s shining on your face! 11. If you’ve got a few dollars to go shopping, do invest quality bedding.  It’s easier to enjoy your sleep when you are comfortable! Being well-rested will help you manifest greater abundance, so comfy bedding *is worth every penny*. 12. Do select a soothing alarm for the morning. Awaken to pleasing music or ringtones to gently transition into the daytime. 13. Do choose to forgive and forget before going to bed. A fight that isn’t resolved at night will just pick right back up in the morning.  Why tarnish your tomorrow over something that happened today? 14. Do invest in an eye mask and earplugs if you are a light sleeper or if your partner snores. 15. Do try out a sleep mediation or sleep hypnosis, especially if you could use a boost! 16. Do avoid social media before bedtime.  There are a lot of things running through your newsfeed, some of which may have the potential to rattle your cage while you are wanting to relax. 17. Do take it easy if you find yourself wide awake.  Instead of* trying* to fall asleep, go along with the wakefulness without struggling.  You can tell yourself “I’m just going to relax and take this opportunity to fantasize about pleasant things” and “when my body needs sleep it will shut me down.” The less you struggle, the easier it is to unwind. After all, if you’re going to be awake, you might as well be awake and happy! 18. Do choose to review your “to do list” in the morning instead of at night. You can’t get tomorrow’s work done today. 19. Do choose to go to sleep at a reasonable time (whatever that means for you of course!). Sometimes there are reasons we have to stay up extra late, but when you have the opportunity to enjoy a good night’s rest, take advantage of it! 20. If you’re a lucid dreamer, do set your intention to have a lucid dream. Lucid dreaming is AWESOME, and it can put you on cloud nine!  If you’d like to learn how to lucid dream, I highly recommend *Exploring the World of Lucid Dreaming*, by Stephen LaBerge. ***Related Article:**[**A 3-Part Morning Routine for Law of Attraction Junkies** ](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/2015/08/03/morning-routine-for-law-of-attraction/ "LOA Article")* I hope you like these bedtime tips for raising your vibration and becoming a more deliberate creator! If you have any other nighttime suggestions, feel free to comment below and share them with me.  XO, Andrea ### Are you learning how to raise your vibration? Sign up for my free **[Law of Attraction newsletter](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.us9.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=36d05de151fc23b6dee2dd220&id=db39a47128 "subscribe")** for conscious advice to help you attract positive outcomes into your life.  You can also become a member of my LOA member website and gain access to a library of video tutorials, ebooks, audiobooks and meditations.  Learn how to attract the things you want with fun, clarity and success!   Join today for as little as[ **$1.99**](https://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/membership-checkout/?level=1 "become a member for just $1.99!")** **or become an annual member for **[30% in savings](https://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/membership-checkout/?level=2 "annual member").** *Article Source: This article was originally published at**[Raise Your Vibration Today](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/2016/06/28/things-to-do-at-bedtime-vibration/)** and was republished with permission from the author.*
posts.html:
By Andrea Schulman | *Raise Your Vibration Today *

Did you know that bedtime is an awesome opportunity toraise your vibration and to set yourself up for more positive manifestations? While we sleep we disconnect our consciousness from the physical world and instead we connect more deeply with our higher self. This connection helps us create with greater ease.

There’s a reason why people tell you to “sleep on it” when you have a big decision-in our dream state we gain clarity and understanding.  We are awesome creators from our sleeping state!

In addition to helping us solve our problems and deliberately create, sleep makes us feel good, boosts our immunity, and helps us heal from injury and illness.  So, whenever it’s possible, it’s a good idea to take advantage of sleep.

Here are 20 things you can do at bedtime to raise your vibration and become a better deliberate creator.  Enjoy!

Bedtime DOs:

  1. Do give big hugs to the people you love before bedtime, if you live with them 🙂
  2. After a rough day, do take a shower or bath before bedtime to wash off the stress and elevate your vibration before drifting off.
  3. Do get some water to put on your nightstand. Sometimes at night we get thirsty, and we always feel better when we’re hydrated.
  4. Do take a moment to snuggle into bed, and appreciate how comfortable your bedding and pajamas are.
  5. Do spend a few moments appreciating what went well during the day.
  6. Do ask a question of the universe before bed. We get lots of clarity from the dream state. You could ask something like “what should I do about that problem at work?” or “what kind of present would my best friend love for her birthday?”
  7. Do set your intention to enjoy the next day.
  8. Do create a peaceful atmosphere in your bedroom. Peaceful places inspire peaceful feelings.
  9. If you like to watch television before bedtime, do be mindful of the programming you select. When we sleep, we often dwell on our last thoughts of the day, so be sure to select programming that’s light and* makes you feel good.*
  10. Do close the blinds or invest in heavy curtains if you want to sleep in the next day.  The light of day is hard to ignore when it’s shining on your face!
  11. If you’ve got a few dollars to go shopping, do invest quality bedding.  It’s easier to enjoy your sleep when you are comfortable! Being well-rested will help you manifest greater abundance, so comfy bedding is worth every penny.
  12. Do select a soothing alarm for the morning. Awaken to pleasing music or ringtones to gently transition into the daytime.
  13. Do choose to forgive and forget before going to bed. A fight that isn’t resolved at night will just pick right back up in the morning.  Why tarnish your tomorrow over something that happened today?
  14. Do invest in an eye mask and earplugs if you are a light sleeper or if your partner snores.
  15. Do try out a sleep mediation or sleep hypnosis, especially if you could use a boost!
  16. Do avoid social media before bedtime.  There are a lot of things running through your newsfeed, some of which may have the potential to rattle your cage while you are wanting to relax.
  17. Do take it easy if you find yourself wide awake.  Instead of* trying* to fall asleep, go along with the wakefulness without struggling.  You can tell yourself “I’m just going to relax and take this opportunity to fantasize about pleasant things” and “when my body needs sleep it will shut me down.” The less you struggle, the easier it is to unwind. After all, if you’re going to be awake, you might as well be awake and happy!
  18. Do choose to review your “to do list” in the morning instead of at night. You can’t get tomorrow’s work done today.
  19. Do choose to go to sleep at a reasonable time (whatever that means for you of course!). Sometimes there are reasons we have to stay up extra late, but when you have the opportunity to enjoy a good night’s rest, take advantage of it!
  20. If you’re a lucid dreamer, do set your intention to have a lucid dream. Lucid dreaming is AWESOME, and it can put you on cloud nine!  If you’d like to learn how to lucid dream, I highly recommend Exploring the World of Lucid Dreaming, by Stephen LaBerge.

Related Article:A 3-Part Morning Routine for Law of Attraction Junkies 

I hope you like these bedtime tips for raising your vibration and becoming a more deliberate creator!

If you have any other nighttime suggestions, feel free to comment below and share them with me. 

XO, Andrea

posts.title: Mom Gives Autistic Boy A Pit Bull. The Results? I'm SHOCKED!
posts.markdown: Sometimes animals can have the most profound effects on people.  For some reason, as humans, we’re naturally inclined to love and care for those creatures who have less than us. But every now and then, these creatures that we agree to care for and love on, change our entire world. Like thirteen-year-old Joey who has autism, a condition that can make it difficult for him to function “normally.”  For Joey, the world can be incredibly overstimulating at times. Social settings are usually awful to endure, so it’s hard to make new friends, meet new people and even show affection to the people you care most about. But Joey’s life changed for the better when he met his soul mate, Roxy the pit bull.  Their immediate connection sparked an instant change in Joey, allowing him to see the world from a new perspective. Joey is now trying out for sports, making friends and figuring out how to show affection to his mother.   *Watch the video above and remember to share with friends and family you think would be touched by Joey and Roxy’s story!*

posts.title: A Chalkboard Full of Strangers’ Regrets All Had One Thing in Common: A Three Letter Word
posts.markdown: If there’s one thing I’ve learned thus far in life, it’s that mistakes are a natural and inherent part of what it means to be human.  When you think about it, you learn the most through failing and making mistakes.  Mistakes and failures eventually turn into wisdom, if you can learn from them. How often do you regret the mistakes you’ve made?  If you’ve grown from them, chances are good that you’re happy with the person they’ve turned you into.  Typically, it’s not the actions we decide to take that we end up regretting the most; it’s the actions that we *never* take out of fear of failure or rejection. On a street in New York City, atop an otherwise blank chalkboard, were the words, “Write your biggest regret” in all capital letters.  Strangers from all over the city were writing down their deepest regrets, letting it all out on this random chalkboard they stumbled across in the city one day. After the chalkboard was filled with regrets, Strayer University, the group who created the video, noticed that almost every single one of them had something in common: a three letter word at the beginning of each of them. *Not* pursuing a passion, *not* trying to get into med school, *not *spending enough time with loved ones. The video illustrates the notion that we should try our best to seize life by the day; living the lives we want to live, unwilling to sacrifice happiness for anything.  Chase opportunity. Never be afraid of the greatness you’re capable of.
posts.html:
If there’s one thing I’ve learned thus far in life, it’s that mistakes are a natural and inherent part of what it means to be human.  When you think about it, you learn the most through failing and making mistakes.  Mistakes and failures eventually turn into wisdom, if you can learn from them.

How often do you regret the mistakes you’ve made?  If you’ve grown from them, chances are good that you’re happy with the person they’ve turned you into.  Typically, it’s not the actions we decide to take that we end up regretting the most; it’s the actions that we never take out of fear of failure or rejection.

On a street in New York City, atop an otherwise blank chalkboard, were the words, “Write your biggest regret” in all capital letters.  Strangers from all over the city were writing down their deepest regrets, letting it all out on this random chalkboard they stumbled across in the city one day.

After the chalkboard was filled with regrets, Strayer University, the group who created the video, noticed that almost every single one of them had something in common: a three letter word at the beginning of each of them. Not pursuing a passion, not trying to get into med school, not spending enough time with loved ones.

The video illustrates the notion that we should try our best to seize life by the day; living the lives we want to live, unwilling to sacrifice happiness for anything.  Chase opportunity. Never be afraid of the greatness you’re capable of.

posts.title: Your Zodiac Sign Says A Lot About How You Express Anger
posts.markdown: Anger is one of those emotions that comes out in everyone differently. Some of us have short fuses that ignite some of the biggest bombs ever seen; others let their angry thoughts bounce around inside of them, reluctant to express them. Your Zodiac sign has a lot to do with how you handle your anger. And knowing how to handle your anger is the first step in building healthier, more positive thought patterns. Here is how each Zodiac sign expresses anger: **Aries** As a fire sign, Aries are known for blowing up and fast. They’re not known for starting arguments or conflict, but they’re incredibly good at ending them. If they aren’t ready to do something, or get forced into something, you will likely see the fire within them. But, just as they’re quick to ignite, they’re quick to forgive and forget. **Taurus** It takes a lot to anger the Taurus, but, should you succeed, good luck trying to make it out alive. They don’t like to waste their energy on angry thoughts, but if you betray them, are disloyal or treat them as inferior, they’re ready to rumble. Give them the time and space they need to calm down as they can stay angry for long periods of time. **Gemini** It’s anyone’s guess as to how the Twins will express their anger. They like to cut deep wounds with a calm, centered demeanor, and they absolutely love to talk. So, if you piss them off, you will undoubtedly get an earful. Just don’t tell them what to do and they’ll likely forgive you. **Cancer** Underneath the Cancer’s hard and protective shell lies a loyal, understanding and sweet being whose only wish is for people to return their affection. This is what usually upsets the Cancer; feeling unloved or unappreciated. You can always tell when a Cancer is angry because they’ll usually sulk around passive-aggressively. Don’t ignore their pleas, it will only hurt them more. **Leo** An angry Leo has no trouble telling you exactly how they feel. Ranting, raving, kicking, screaming.. The leo is very capable of making a grand spectacle. And, they’re quick to say things that really hurt, so if they do, just know that it’s one of the only ways they know how to release their anger: venting. They’re not likely to hold a grudge, however, and will probably move past most conflicts fairly fast. **Virgo** Known for being both patient and loving, the Virgo has a great capacity for abuse before being set off in an angry way. Because they like to avoid confrontation, Virgos will often become incredibly passive aggressive. They’re not going to hold a grudge, but they’re not going to forget about what you did, either. **Libra** As a peacekeeper, the Libra’s scales fit perfectly here. Balance is valued in everything, especially relationships. This means that confrontation is often avoided, and emotions get bottled up. Even when they’re at the peak of their frustration, Libras do their best to wear a happy face as they hold back their rage. If the hurt is great enough, they are definitely capable of holding a grudge. **Scorpio** Similar to other signs, the Scorpio doesn’t let out anger as it comes to them. You can always tell if a Scorpio is angry by looking into their eyes. Their eyes will say more than anything. They’re usually venting in their minds, planning their next move. If they suddenly get really quiet and you see angry eyes come out, give them some space. And don’t try to force them into anything before they’re ready. **Sagittarius** Surefire ways to piss off a Sagittarius include dishonesty, disloyalty, being cruel and spewing hate speech. While they tend to be a patient sign, and they don’t angry very often, when they do get angry they’re not interested in playing nice, *at all*. You’ll know they’re starting to get angry when the heavy sarcasm starts pouring out. **Capricorn** As an Earth sign, Capricorns aren’t too pent up with anger. They like to keep things easy-going, but also have a threshold you can reach. You’re most likely to piss them off by accidentally messing up the ‘zen’ of their space. Capricorns get angry for seemingly random reasons, and they don’t like to express it. They enjoy sulking before they’re ready to throw a tantrum. **Aquarius** Arguing is the last thing the Aquarius wants to do, so that’s what they tend to avoid, choosing to completely ignore people instead. If they can’t seem to get away from whatever it is that’s upsetting them, they’re likely to blow up just because of how frustrated they are. Depending on who they’re arguing with, they may or may not want to continue the relationship. **Pisces** The Pisces is somewhat volatile, meaning you never know what’s going to light their fuse. If they’re having a bad day already, it’s easier for them to explode. But, they don’t enjoy confrontation and would rather avoid it. If a smoke or a drink won’t help, they know that crying will. Of all the signs, Pisceans tend to cry the most when it comes to anger and frustration. h/t [**SpiritScience**](http://thespiritscience.net/2016/07/13/how-each-sign-of-the-zodiac-expresses-their-anger/)
posts.html:
Anger is one of those emotions that comes out in everyone differently. Some of us have short fuses that ignite some of the biggest bombs ever seen; others let their angry thoughts bounce around inside of them, reluctant to express them.

Your Zodiac sign has a lot to do with how you handle your anger. And knowing how to handle your anger is the first step in building healthier, more positive thought patterns.

Here is how each Zodiac sign expresses anger:

Aries

As a fire sign, Aries are known for blowing up and fast. They’re not known for starting arguments or conflict, but they’re incredibly good at ending them. If they aren’t ready to do something, or get forced into something, you will likely see the fire within them.

But, just as they’re quick to ignite, they’re quick to forgive and forget.

Taurus

It takes a lot to anger the Taurus, but, should you succeed, good luck trying to make it out alive. They don’t like to waste their energy on angry thoughts, but if you betray them, are disloyal or treat them as inferior, they’re ready to rumble.

Give them the time and space they need to calm down as they can stay angry for long periods of time.

Gemini

It’s anyone’s guess as to how the Twins will express their anger. They like to cut deep wounds with a calm, centered demeanor, and they absolutely love to talk. So, if you piss them off, you will undoubtedly get an earful. Just don’t tell them what to do and they’ll likely forgive you.

Cancer

Underneath the Cancer’s hard and protective shell lies a loyal, understanding and sweet being whose only wish is for people to return their affection. This is what usually upsets the Cancer; feeling unloved or unappreciated. You can always tell when a Cancer is angry because they’ll usually sulk around passive-aggressively.

Don’t ignore their pleas, it will only hurt them more.

Leo

An angry Leo has no trouble telling you exactly how they feel. Ranting, raving, kicking, screaming.. The leo is very capable of making a grand spectacle. And, they’re quick to say things that really hurt, so if they do, just know that it’s one of the only ways they know how to release their anger: venting.

They’re not likely to hold a grudge, however, and will probably move past most conflicts fairly fast.

Virgo

Known for being both patient and loving, the Virgo has a great capacity for abuse before being set off in an angry way. Because they like to avoid confrontation, Virgos will often become incredibly passive aggressive.

They’re not going to hold a grudge, but they’re not going to forget about what you did, either.

Libra

As a peacekeeper, the Libra’s scales fit perfectly here. Balance is valued in everything, especially relationships. This means that confrontation is often avoided, and emotions get bottled up. Even when they’re at the peak of their frustration, Libras do their best to wear a happy face as they hold back their rage.

If the hurt is great enough, they are definitely capable of holding a grudge.

Scorpio

Similar to other signs, the Scorpio doesn’t let out anger as it comes to them. You can always tell if a Scorpio is angry by looking into their eyes. Their eyes will say more than anything. They’re usually venting in their minds, planning their next move.

If they suddenly get really quiet and you see angry eyes come out, give them some space. And don’t try to force them into anything before they’re ready.

Sagittarius

Surefire ways to piss off a Sagittarius include dishonesty, disloyalty, being cruel and spewing hate speech. While they tend to be a patient sign, and they don’t angry very often, when they do get angry they’re not interested in playing nice, at all.

You’ll know they’re starting to get angry when the heavy sarcasm starts pouring out.

Capricorn

As an Earth sign, Capricorns aren’t too pent up with anger. They like to keep things easy-going, but also have a threshold you can reach. You’re most likely to piss them off by accidentally messing up the ‘zen’ of their space.

Capricorns get angry for seemingly random reasons, and they don’t like to express it. They enjoy sulking before they’re ready to throw a tantrum.

Aquarius

Arguing is the last thing the Aquarius wants to do, so that’s what they tend to avoid, choosing to completely ignore people instead. If they can’t seem to get away from whatever it is that’s upsetting them, they’re likely to blow up just because of how frustrated they are.

Depending on who they’re arguing with, they may or may not want to continue the relationship.

Pisces

The Pisces is somewhat volatile, meaning you never know what’s going to light their fuse. If they’re having a bad day already, it’s easier for them to explode. But, they don’t enjoy confrontation and would rather avoid it.

If a smoke or a drink won’t help, they know that crying will. Of all the signs, Pisceans tend to cry the most when it comes to anger and frustration.

h/t SpiritScience

posts.title: How To Make Peace With What Is (& Make it Better!)
posts.markdown: By [**Andrea Schulman**](https://www.facebook.com/raiseyourvibrationtoday/?fref=ts) | [**Raise Your Vibration Today **](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/2016/07/11/make-peace-with-what-is/) The [Law of Attraction](http://www.raiseyourvibrationtoday.com "Raise Your Vibration Today") is all about paradoxes, and this is a big one: *You’ve gotta make peace with what is ****before**** you can get something better.* Most of us learn about the LOA and we immediately want to put it to use to make our lives better. We identify all the things we DON’T have, and we go to work to try to make them happen.  So, we focus on the boyfriend we don’t have yet, the promotion we haven’t gotten, or the weight we haven’t lost yet.  We focus on what is lacking in order to try to create what is wanted into our realities. Unfortunately, this strategy doesn’t work! You’ve gotta make peace with what is first. ## When life isn’t good enough as it is If you focused on why your life isn’t good enough as it is, you only amplify the “my life isn’t good enough” vibe. Then, thanks to the Law of Attraction, your life will continue to feel “not good enough!” Your reality will always reflect back to you your dominant belief structure. For example, you can’t focus on how much your hate your current home and hope you’ll be able to find one you’ll love. Sure, you may move and you may find a new home.  However, rest assured, you will be just as dissatisfied with your new home as you were with the old one.  This is because with the LOA we are always creating whatever is a match to our dominant thought patterns.  If we believe where we live sucks, then where we live must continue to suck. It doesn’t matter where we go or how many times we move. You’d be much more successful in making peace with your current home, and coming to love it as it is.  Once you make peace with your current home, you become a match to homes you love. The universe will knock its socks off to match whatever you’re putting out there. So, if you want your life to be great, you have to start projecting the vibe that says “my life is great now!” This is done by making peace with what is, and loving it as it stands. ## Why so many people project dissatisfaction over satisfaction I know making peace with what is can seem a bit counterintuitive. Most people have been raised to believe they have to improve their lives, and that their lives aren’t good enough as they are. People are also often taught to evaluate the problems in their lives more closely than the blessings. Unfortunately, this social programming keeps many of us stuck in a rut. This is why you know a guy who’s on his third failed marriage. This is why you have a friend who is always sick. This is why so many people go on a different diet every year. When we focus on what’s lacking, we create more lack. On the surface things may change, but it’s just the same shit, different day. Remind yourself of this principle of the LOA on a regular basis. When you find yourself criticizing where you are, remember you are perpetuating lack. Being happy where you stand will make you a match to people, events and situations that reinforce your happiness, not your lack. ## How do you make peace with what is? One thing you can do right now to make peace with where you are is to play the “perspective game.” The perspective game enables you to make peace with where you are in the present moment. To play this game, step into someone else’s shoes and evaluate your life from an alternative perspective.  List out the things you have, and view them from the perspective of* not* having them. Imagine living a life where the things you have right now are still just dreams to you. The bigger the list, the better. Here is a short list of things I have in my life.  To play the perspective game, I write out the list, and then take a moment imagining my life without these blessings:  1. I have two healthy and adorable children. 2. I have a wonderful husband who loves me and treats me like a queen. 3. I have a great relationship with my brother. He is a kindred spirit to me. 4. I have close friends I get to spend lots of time with. 5. I have a bunch of friendly and positive clients and I run my own business. 6. I’m healthy and in good shape. 7. I’ve had an exceptional education, and I have lots of skills and knowledge that benefit me because of it. 8. I live near the beach. 9. I drive my own car. 10. I get to vacation several times every year. 11. I own my own home. 12. I have money in the bank and my expenses are always paid with ease. 13. I really like all of my neighbors. 14. I’ve got an awesome phone and computer and all kinds of cool technological gadgets. To me, each of the items on this list seems very normal to me, because they are each a part of my current reality.  However, these things are HUGE dreams for some people out there. In fact, just looking at this list makes me feel like my life is pretty great.  I can’t even imagine living a life without my relationships, my health or my education. Yet,* *there are people out there who live without these blessings every day. It’s very hard for me to justify dissatisfaction with my life when I look at things from this perspective.  I’m just too grateful for what I have when I look at it this way. ## Why perspective matters When I look at this list through the perspective of those who don’t have what I already have, it reminds me just how blessed I truly am. When I look at my life through this lens, it’s easy for me to make peace with where I am.  ***Related Article:**[20 Heartfelt Ways to Say Thank You](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/2016/01/06/heartfelt-ways-to-say-thank-you/ "LOA Article")* When I look through my life focused on what I *haven’t *created or achieved, it’s much, much easier to feel unfulfilled. I’m not at peace when I evaluate my life based on my unfulfilled dreams.  How at peace I am with my life has everything to do with which perspective I choose to take. In playing this perspective game, you come to see all of the wonderful things you have already created in your life.  You are focused on what you HAVE rather than what you DON’T have.  This projects a vibe that shouts out “I am fortunate in so many ways!” A message like this becomes reinforced in your reality, allowing more and more good things to come into your life. The universe must continue to bless you, if you believe you are blessed. ## Work within the paradox! So, if you are wanting to use the Law of Attraction to improve your quality of life, make sure you are working within the paradox.  You’ve gotta make peace with what is before something better will come along.  Remember, your life is great *right here and now, regardless of where you stand.  *There are always dreams you have achieved, and there are always reasons to be grateful.* *When you acknowledge this truth and declare your life to be great, your life will reflect greatness back to you in spades. How is your life already great? Why is where you stand a wonderful place to be? Feel free to comment below and declare the greatness of your life right now! XO, Andrea ### Are you a student of the Law of Attraction? Sign up for my free [Law of Attraction newsletter](http://raiseyourvibrationtoday.us9.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=36d05de151fc23b6dee2dd220&id=db39a47128 "subscribe") for conscious advice to help you attract positive outcomes into your life.  You can also become a member of my LOA member website and gain access to a library of video tutorials, ebooks, audiobooks and meditations.  Learn how to attract the things you want with fun, clarity and success!   Join today for as little as[ $1.99](https://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/membership-checkout/?level=1 "become a member for just $1.99!") or become an annual member for [30% in savings](https://raiseyourvibrationtoday.com/membership-checkout/?level=2 "annual member").

Most of us learn about the LOA and we immediately want to put it to use to make our lives better. We identify all the things we DON’T have, and we go to work to try to make them happen.

This is because with the LOA we are always creating whatever is a match to our dominant thought patterns.  If we believe where we live sucks, then where we live must continue to suck. It doesn’t matter where we go or how many times we move.

You’d be much more successful in making peace with your current home, and coming to love it as it is.  Once you make peace with your current home, you become a match to homes you love. The universe will knock its socks off to match whatever you’re putting out there.

So, if you want your life to be great, you have to start projecting the vibe that says “my life is great now!” This is done by making peace with what is, and loving it as it stands.

One thing you can do right now to make peace with where you are is to play the “perspective game.” The perspective game enables you to make peace with where you are in the present moment.

  4. I have close friends I get to spend lots of time with.

To me, each of the items on this list seems very normal to me, because they are each a part of my current reality.  However, these things are HUGE dreams for some people out there.

It’s very hard for me to justify dissatisfaction with my life when I look at things from this perspective.  I’m just too grateful for what I have when I look at it this way.

When I look at this list through the perspective of those who don’t have what I already have, it reminds me just how blessed I truly am. When I look at my life through this lens, it’s easy for me to make peace with where I am.

posts.title: People Destined to Be With One Another Have An Invisible Red String Tied Between Them
posts.markdown: Did you know there’s an ancient legend that speaks of an invisible red string of fate. This string is said to bind together any two people whose destinies are intertwined. This intangible thread that connects to people to one another is said to be unbreakable and not bound by time, place or circumstance. **Red** Red is the color most strongly linked to attraction and desire. This is the natural color of the string of fate that connects two people. **Its Origins** The red string of fate is a legend that has its roots in ancient East Asian culture. This version of the tale speaks a red string that binds together the ankles of people who will meet each other or come to help one another at a certain point in time. **Soul mate** Just like Western culture has the notion of ‘soul mates,’ this legend is regarded in much the same way. The main difference between the red string of fate and a twin flame is that the East Asian proverb focuses mainly on two people being bound together, instead of each person discovering their other half. **The Legend** The story of the red string of fate comes from a young boy who was walking home one night. He discovered a man reading a book along the way, so he quickly asked him what it was he was reading. A book of marriages, said the old man, telling the young boy that his marriage was on the horizon. However, after showing the boy who he was destined to marry… **The Trouble** He was not interested in the idea of marriage. He just didn’t want to do it. So he tossed a rock at the girl and ran off in the opposite direction. After years had passed, another marriage was arranged for the boy, to one of the most beautiful girls in the village. Upon seeing her for the first time, he saw she had a scar from where he had thrown that rock that fateful day years ago. The two of them were destined to be together, he could not deny it. The red string of fate serves as a constant reminder that, regardless of who you find on the other end of it, you’re going to have to work to make the relationship last. Let it inspire loyalty, devotion and compassion with you and your partner. Because, no matter where you are or how far away you are from one another, the thread will always be binding the two of you together. h/t [**Rebel Circus **](http://www.rebelcircus.com/blog/invisible-thread-two-people-meant-together/9)
posts.html:
Did you know there’s an ancient legend that speaks of an invisible red string of fate. This string is said to bind together any two people whose destinies are intertwined. This intangible thread that connects to people to one another is said to be unbreakable and not bound by time, place or circumstance.

Red

Red is the color most strongly linked to attraction and desire. This is the natural color of the string of fate that connects two people.

Its Origins

The red string of fate is a legend that has its roots in ancient East Asian culture. This version of the tale speaks a red string that binds together the ankles of people who will meet each other or come to help one another at a certain point in time.

Soul mate

Just like Western culture has the notion of ‘soul mates,’ this legend is regarded in much the same way. The main difference between the red string of fate and a twin flame is that the East Asian proverb focuses mainly on two people being bound together, instead of each person discovering their other half.

The Legend

The story of the red string of fate comes from a young boy who was walking home one night. He discovered a man reading a book along the way, so he quickly asked him what it was he was reading. A book of marriages, said the old man, telling the young boy that his marriage was on the horizon. However, after showing the boy who he was destined to marry…

The Trouble

He was not interested in the idea of marriage. He just didn’t want to do it. So he tossed a rock at the girl and ran off in the opposite direction. After years had passed, another marriage was arranged for the boy, to one of the most beautiful girls in the village.

Upon seeing her for the first time, he saw she had a scar from where he had thrown that rock that fateful day years ago. The two of them were destined to be together, he could not deny it.

The red string of fate serves as a constant reminder that, regardless of who you find on the other end of it, you’re going to have to work to make the relationship last. Let it inspire loyalty, devotion and compassion with you and your partner.

Because, no matter where you are or how far away you are from one another, the thread will always be binding the two of you together.

h/t *Rebel Circus *

posts.title: What One Woman Did After Seeing a Sad Man and His Family in the Freezing Cold Will Shock You
posts.markdown:
Apple Valley, Minnesota is the where this story takes place, and if you know anything about Minnesota, you know that it’s notorious for its freezing temperatures.   A woman named Nicole was on her to way to work one day when she stopped at a gas station in Apple Valley to fill up.  She was sitting in her car, warming up and waiting for the pump to stop when she noticed a middle-aged man at one of the other pumps.   The tears on his somber-looking face told Nicole that something was wrong, so she curiously went over to see what the problem was. “I began to wonder what happened with this man and as I got out of my car and looked at him my heart felt like it stopped,” Nicole posted on Facebook. Not only was this man wearing flip flops with raggedy old socks in the middle of winter, but his wife and two daughters were huddled in the back of their car under a blanket, struggling to keep warm.   Upon being asked what was wrong, the man broke down in tears, stating that he could not provide for his family.   After seeing that this man and his family were truly in a dark place, Nicole knew she had to help. Read her account of this fascinating story below: ![](http://cdn5.littlethings.com/app/uploads/2016/04/10906141_804975756240834_4723234741464899509_n-600x600.jpg) “So I was just on my way to work and I had to stop for gas so I allowed myself some extra time to get to work. When I pulled up to the pump I shut my car off and saw this middle aged man crying looking at the gas pump. I began to wonder what happened with this man and as I got out of my car and looked at him my heart felt like it stopped.” ![](http://cdn4.littlethings.com/app/uploads/2016/04/5399202806_86c8343d06_b-600x398.jpg) “In Apple Valley, Minnesota it is 10 degrees and freezing cold with the wind. This man was wearing flip flops with socks covered in holes. I look at his car and see his wife in the front seat covering her face in her hands and the 2 teenage girls both cuddling under a blanket in the back seat.”
“I didn’t even think and I went up to the man and said ‘sir is something the matter?’ He looked at me and I could tell he was on the verge of giving up because he didn’t even try to conceal his tears when he said ‘I can’t even provide for my family.’” Without even thinking I put my card in his machine and told him Jesus Christ the Son of God died to provide for you. Fill up. Something, something came alive in him. He was in shock and it was like he forgot how to pump gas. “
“In that same moment his wife got out of her car, she asked her husband what was going on and he told her I just payed for their gas she started to cry and came around the corner to shake my hand when I saw her pants dirty and torn. I asked her to come to my car. The airport lost some of my luggage on my way to Minnesota from California and I had to clean out my closet to find stuff to wear and get rid of a lot of stuff all of that stuff that I had yet to give away was siting in the back seat of the car and in the trunk. I opened up my car and told the lady to take what she wanted.” ![](http://cdn6.littlethings.com/app/uploads/2016/04/car.large_-600x387.jpg) “This lady RAN back to her car. I was so afraid I had just embraced her but a moment later her and her two girls were digging through those clothes layering my sweatshirts and shirts and sweat pants over the worn out clothes they had been wearing. Soon the father had finished pumping the gas and came over. This attracted a little crowd at the gas station. And some older man gave the family a gift card and another middle aged man gave away his jacket to the father. Never in my life did I think I would see this kind of thing happen at a gas station with a handful of complete strangers.” ![](http://cdn5.littlethings.com/app/uploads/2016/04/11811504_921279941277081_1282386861773519412_n-600x600.jpg)
 “But it gives me hope. That the love of God can be so contagious. That we are not alone in being the change we want to see in the world. That God’s love is greater than anything and we get to be a part of that love changing lives. And HE always provides!”
This story is the perfect example of how random acts kindness can change the lives of others.  If you feel inspired or touched, please share with your friends and loved ones!
http://www.littlethings.com/gas-station-story/

“In that same moment his wife got out of her car, she asked her husband what was going on and he told her I just payed for their gas she started to cry and came around the corner to shake my hand when I saw her pants dirty and torn. I asked her to come to my car. The airport lost some of my luggage on my way to Minnesota from California and I had to clean out my closet to find stuff to wear and get rid of a lot of stuff all of that stuff that I had yet to give away was siting in the back seat of the car and in the trunk. I opened up my car and told the lady to take what she wanted.” “This lady RAN back to her car. I was so afraid I had just embraced her but a moment later her and her two girls were digging through those clothes layering my sweatshirts and shirts and sweat pants over the worn out clothes they had been wearing. Soon the father had finished pumping the gas and came over. This attracted a little crowd at the gas station. And some older man gave the family a gift card and another middle aged man gave away his jacket to the father. Never in my life did I think I would see this kind of thing happen at a gas station with a handful of complete strangers.”
 “But it gives me hope. That the love of God can be so contagious. That we are not alone in being the change we want to see in the world. That God’s love is greater than anything and we get to be a part of that love changing lives. And HE always provides!”
This story is the perfect example of how random acts kindness can change the lives of others.  If you feel inspired or touched, please share with your friends and loved ones!
http://www.littlethings.com/gas-station-story/

posts.title: 5 Things to Understand About the Sometimes Hard to Love Scorpio
posts.markdown: Loving a Scorpio can easily be one of the best, and worst, experiences of your life. If you’ve ever loved one, then you know exactly what I’m talking about. They’re hard to decipher and can do a number on anyone who’s not prepared. Their complex nature makes them one of the most misunderstood signs in the zodiac, so if you’ve fallen for one, a bit of helpful information will serve to your benefit. These are five things that create the Scorpio’s ‘tough love’ mentality: **They’re manipulative at times** Scorpios usually know exactly what they want, and they have numerous different ways of getting it. While they’re not keen on lying to anyone, their ability to weave a persuasive argument around the truth is unrivaled. Sometimes they live with an attitude of ‘the end justifies the means,’ which helps in some aspects of life, but detriments others (i.e. relationships). **The sex is *****great*** Because sex is such an important part of every Scorpio’s relationship, keeping it fun and exciting is not only easy for the Scorpio, but necessary. They’re not interested in having the same sex *every* time; if it becomes predictable and boring, they’re going to become frustrated. If there’s one thing to keep an open mind about with the Scorpio, it’s your life in the bedroom. **They’re entirely loyal** When a Scorpio is fond of you, they’ve got your back whenever, wherever. Their deep loyalty to the people they choose to spend their time with is an admirable and sometimes redeeming quality. **They can hold grudges** Hurting the Scorpio is a very dramatic endeavor. If you wrong them, a grudge will start brewing within them the likes of which you’ve never seen. They believe everyone should be as deeply loyal as they are, so when it is not reciprocated, forgiveness is the last thing on their mind. **They expect the best for themselves** Scorpios’ tough love nature ultimately comes from their high standards and expectations of those around them (and themselves). They know what they want, they know what they deserve, and they have no trouble telling others how they feel. Because the Scorpio is always giving their best, they expect it in return. But, one pitfall of this attitude is that Scorpios are also very critical of themselves, to the point that it becomes incredibly detrimental to their lives. h/t[** Elite Daily **](http://elitedaily.com/life/culture/scorpios-worst-best-zodiac/1258537/)
posts.html:
Loving a Scorpio can easily be one of the best, and worst, experiences of your life. If you’ve ever loved one, then you know exactly what I’m talking about. They’re hard to decipher and can do a number on anyone who’s not prepared.

Their complex nature makes them one of the most misunderstood signs in the zodiac, so if you’ve fallen for one, a bit of helpful information will serve to your benefit.

These are five things that create the Scorpio’s ‘tough love’ mentality:

They’re manipulative at times

Scorpios usually know exactly what they want, and they have numerous different ways of getting it. While they’re not keen on lying to anyone, their ability to weave a persuasive argument around the truth is unrivaled.

Sometimes they live with an attitude of ‘the end justifies the means,’ which helps in some aspects of life, but detriments others (i.e. relationships).

The sex is *great*

Because sex is such an important part of every Scorpio’s relationship, keeping it fun and exciting is not only easy for the Scorpio, but necessary. They’re not interested in having the same sex every time; if it becomes predictable and boring, they’re going to become frustrated.

If there’s one thing to keep an open mind about with the Scorpio, it’s your life in the bedroom.

They’re entirely loyal

When a Scorpio is fond of you, they’ve got your back whenever, wherever. Their deep loyalty to the people they choose to spend their time with is an admirable and sometimes redeeming quality.

They can hold grudges

Hurting the Scorpio is a very dramatic endeavor. If you wrong them, a grudge will start brewing within them the likes of which you’ve never seen. They believe everyone should be as deeply loyal as they are, so when it is not reciprocated, forgiveness is the last thing on their mind.

They expect the best for themselves

Scorpios’ tough love nature ultimately comes from their high standards and expectations of those around them (and themselves). They know what they want, they know what they deserve, and they have no trouble telling others how they feel.

Because the Scorpio is always giving their best, they expect it in return. But, one pitfall of this attitude is that Scorpios are also very critical of themselves, to the point that it becomes incredibly detrimental to their lives.

h/t* Elite Daily *

posts.title: 5 Ways Toxic People Manipulate You
posts.markdown: Toxic people make their way into our lives sometimes without us even realizing it. And they come in all different forms, from the psychopath to the sociopath. They all share common traits and behaviors, which you should probably be aware of, so you can recognize a toxic person and do your best to get rid of them or avoid them at all costs. Here are five ways that toxic people manipulate you into complete silence: **“Gaslighting”** **[Gaslighting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaslighting)** is a fairly simple tactic that gets used often by toxic people. You can recognize it when people start calling out a toxic person’s poor behavior or actions, and they vehemently deny the reality of what happened, claiming the other person to be crazy or mentally unstable. If they’re doing things that drive you crazy, and then deny any wrongdoing, they’re gaslighting you. **Word Salad** Have you ever asked a person a question, but instead of an actual answer, all you get is them talking in circles trying to form a somewhat coherent argument as to why any and all responsibility should be lifted from them? They do this to confuse and irritate you. You’ll really notice it when you disagree with them on a minor issue, and they start personally attacking every aspect of your life. **Blanket Generalizations** The worse kinds of toxic people are terrible at forming legitimate arguments. Instead, they often use generalizations to prove points that aren’t necessarily true. Words like ‘never’ and ‘always’ get tossed around a lot in regards to behavior. You can’t be logical with them, otherwise they throw another fit and start with the personal attacks again. **Quick to Conclusions** Toxic people like to think that they know what others are thinking and feeling at most times. But they only operate and act in a world filled with their delusions, so they tend to immediately think they know exactly what’s going on. So, they aren’t apologetic, they try to speak for you, and should you ever resist, they’ll make *you* look like the insane one. **Subject Changes** A popular tactic among toxic people is to simply change the subject as soon as it starts focusing on them and their negative behaviors. When this happens, keep your cool and focus entirely on what you want to talk about, always bringing it back to the issue at hand instead of letting them trail off on some random tangent. If this is a lost cause, just choose not to interact with them. There’s no point in wasting anymore energy on them.

posts.title: You’re Less Likely to Find Love if You’re Intelligent and Independent, Here's Why:
posts.markdown: Have you ever thought about how love changes and grows to mean different things at different points in your life? The love you were looking for in your teenage years is not the same love that you were looking for in your twenties, a trend that I would imagine continues to hold up as we all grow older. But an interesting thing happens as we mature into old age. Love starts to become more delicate, more complicated. Not only does it become harder to fall in love, but truly letting go of any painful past loves can be even harder. You would think that it would get easier as we move through the motions of each relationship or romantic experience, but it’s actually our deep understanding of relationships that makes the whole process so much more difficult. Just as with most things in life, our perceptions create the emotions that we feel. Love is not inherently magical; it is our feelings and perceptions that create this feeling of magic. Unfortunately, as we get older, that magic starts to wane, simply because our understanding of relationships (and our roles within them) becomes so clear that there’s no room left for mystery or magic. So, is there anyway to combat this? Kind of. One of the only ways we fall in love as we grow older is feeling that we *need* love. If you’re of the mindset that you don’t deserve love or truly need it, then it will never come your way. I found love when I decided that I was ready to build something special with another person. I wanted someone in my life that would be willing to take the next steps with me, who wanted to be by my side during all of life’s adventures. And I didn’t have any of that before, because I didn’t truly want it. I was fine being by myself, adventuring solo, figuring things out on my own. So, it makes sense why intelligent, independent people struggle to find love; they’re content doing the solo thing. It will only come to you once you feel that it has a place in your world.

Unfortunately, as we get older, that magic starts to wane, simply because our understanding of relationships (and our roles within them) becomes so clear that there’s no room left for mystery or magic.

posts.title: The People of India Just Planted 50 Million New Trees in 24 Hours
posts.markdown: Recently, the country of India saw over 800,000 volunteers flood the streets of Uttar Pradesh state, planting 50 million new trees in just 24 hours as they attempted to set a new world record. As a country that serves as home to [six of the top ten cities](http://www.sciencealert.com/these-are-the-10-cities-with-the-worst-air-pollution-in-the-world) with the worst quality of air in the world, India’s latest efforts illustrate their continued commitment to reducing the effects of climate change. Other projects that India has championed include having the world’s first [completely solar powered airport](http://www.sciencealert.com/india-establishes-world-s-first-100-percent-solar-powered-airport) and the world’s biggest [solar power station](http://www.sciencealert.com/world-s-largest-solar-power-station-planned-for-india). Furthermore, solar energy is now [cheaper than coal](http://www.sciencealert.com/india-says-the-cost-of-solar-power-is-now-cheaper-than-coal) in the country. The record that they’re hoping to beat was set by Pakistan back in 2013 when they planted 847,275 trees. As we speak, Guinness World Record auditors are working on counting through the high number of trees planted by India’s close to 800,000 volunteers. But due to the high number of volunteers, it is expected that they will achieve their goal. “The biggest contribution of this tree planting project is, apart from the tokenism, that it focuses on the major issues,” [said Anit Mukherjee](http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/07/15/india-plants-50-million-trees-in-24-hours/), policy fellow with the Centre for Global Development. “It addresses many of the big issues for India: Pollution, deforestation, and land use.” Planting 50 million trees is just the first step for those who are taking part in the project, as almost 60 percent of new saplings will perish due to lack of water or disease. After planting the trees, you “need to have procedures in place to care for them and protect them,” says [Edward Parson](http://www.csmonitor.com/World/Global-News/2016/0712/India-hopes-to-break-tree-planting-record.-Will-it-help), environmental law professor at the University of California. One of India’s senior forest officials, Sanjeev Saran, says that sites where trees have been planted will be carefully monitored using aerial photography, so they can be sure that the saplings are surviving. India’s efforts to [combat climate change](http://www4.unfccc.int/submissions/INDC/Published%20Documents/India/1/INDIA%20INDC%20TO%20UNFCCC.pdf) are inspiring and admirable. We can only hope that [more nations](http://www.sciencealert.com/here-s-what-you-need-to-know-about-the-climate-deal-from-paris) start to get on board in similar fashion. h/t [**Science Alert**](http://www.sciencealert.com/india-planted-50-million-trees-in-just-24-hours-last-week)
posts.html:
Recently, the country of India saw over 800,000 volunteers flood the streets of Uttar Pradesh state, planting 50 million new trees in just 24 hours as they attempted to set a new world record.

As a country that serves as home to six of the top ten cities with the worst quality of air in the world, India’s latest efforts illustrate their continued commitment to reducing the effects of climate change.

Other projects that India has championed include having the world’s first completely solar powered airport and the world’s biggest solar power station. Furthermore, solar energy is now cheaper than coal in the country.

The record that they’re hoping to beat was set by Pakistan back in 2013 when they planted 847,275 trees. As we speak, Guinness World Record auditors are working on counting through the high number of trees planted by India’s close to 800,000 volunteers. But due to the high number of volunteers, it is expected that they will achieve their goal.

“The biggest contribution of this tree planting project is, apart from the tokenism, that it focuses on the major issues,” said Anit Mukherjee, policy fellow with the Centre for Global Development. “It addresses many of the big issues for India: Pollution, deforestation, and land use.”

Planting 50 million trees is just the first step for those who are taking part in the project, as almost 60 percent of new saplings will perish due to lack of water or disease. After planting the trees, you “need to have procedures in place to care for them and protect them,” says Edward Parson, environmental law professor at the University of California.

One of India’s senior forest officials, Sanjeev Saran, says that sites where trees have been planted will be carefully monitored using aerial photography, so they can be sure that the saplings are surviving.

India’s efforts to combat climate change are inspiring and admirable. We can only hope that more nations start to get on board in similar fashion.

h/t Science Alert

posts.title: What Addictions Are You Most Likely to Have, Based on Your Zodiac Sign
posts.markdown: Addiction takes hold in almost everyone’s life, regardless of who we are, because addiction is unique for everyone. Maybe you’re addicted to playing video games, maybe you’re addicted to working out, or maybe you’ve dabbled with addiction to hard drugs; either way, each and every addiction is indicative of a bigger problem in a person’s life. And each zodiac sign is complete with its own set of problems that we have to deal with. Addiction can be a very detrimental aspect of life if it is not recognized until it’s too late, so here is a bit of insight as to what each sign is most likely to gravitate toward: **Aries **(March 21 – April 19) | Cocaine As one of the youngest signs of the zodiac, Aries are often of the opinion that life doesn’t move quick enough. Their personalities are usually a big mess of confidence mixed together with neediness. They’re likely to choose cocaine over other substances because it reinforces their already fantastical perspective that they’re always slightly ahead of everyone else. **Taurus **(April 20 – May 20) | Cannabis / Food / Both Taurus have almost too much patience for their own good. This patience oftentimes transforms into laziness, which means that the Taurus isn’t going to go out of his or her way to develop an addiction to crack or meth, simply because it’s a lot harder to find. Food is the most likely addiction; pick up the phone, punch in some numbers, and food is at your door within 20 minutes. **Gemini **(May 21 – June 20) | Social Media Certain studies have found that Facebook can be more addictive than alcohol, a notion that Gemini can easily understand. Gemini hide from their feelings by compulsively communicating, jumping from conversation to the next. They tend to enjoy doing a variety of different things, but never really get too involved with any of them. **Cancer **(June 21 – July 22) | Heroin Heroin suits the Cancer almost perfectly, as they prefer to retreat into reclusivity when the world around them starts to crumble. Wherever they gain the most comfort and security is where the Cancer gravitates to, and heroin has oft been described as being taken to a world literally everything is *okay*, as if you were a baby again without a care in the world. **Leo **(July 23 – August 22) | Shopping Leos tend to have materialistic tendencies, and vanity is one of their hallmark characteristics, so it makes perfect sense that a Leo would struggle with finances and irresponsible spending. Leo women like to sport designer clothing and expensive jewelry, while Leo men prefer to spend their money on new gadgets and luxury vehicles. This all plays on the bigger issue of the Leo’s innate desire to be in the limelight as much as possible. **Virgo **(August 23 – September 22) | Codependency Virgo people naturally gravitate toward being in positions of caretaking, often putting their unique ability to problem solve and care for others to good use on those they care about. The downside to this trait becomes obvious when they put *too much* focus on the well being of others, and not enough on their own. Virgos sometimes unconsciously seek out people who are struggling in life, seemingly unable to care for themselves. This lets them put their own life problems on the backburner in order to fix someone else’s. **Libra **(September 23 – October 22) | Love Ironically, as a sign that represents fairness and balance, Libras often struggle to embody the values that their sign is known for. From the start, they expect life to operate on a level of fairness that simply doesn’t exist, which frustrates them to the point of tears. To add to the fire, they have a constant need for a partner to make them feel balanced. The Libra should focus on finding balance in their own life by getting rid of ridiculous expectations, and by not treating relationships like they’re the end-all-be-all. **Scorpio **(October 23 – November 21) | Sex / Porn Scorpios are notorious for their adventurous nature in the bedroom; they’re highly passionate beings who consider sex to be very important in a relationship. Tie this in with their secluded and voyeuristic nature, and porn becomes a preferred sexual outlet. Complex and somewhat confusing, while Scorpios truly desire intimate connection and passion with others, it’s also something that scares them the most. **Sagittarius **(November 22 – December 21) | Gambling / Drinking Sagittarius is a sign closely tied to Jupiter, the planet of luck and gifts. They have a very broad view on life, always seeking out new information with a yearning to understand. As a sign of luck, they’re often quite optimistic when it comes to taking risks in life. A quality that easily carries over to betting money and throwing dice, or even drinking and driving. **Capricorn **(December 22 – January 19) | Pills / Eating Disorders Capricorns have a natural desire to be “high status” in society. So they’re most likely to have an addiction that can be passed off as somewhat acceptable, like pharmaceuticals. To keep a clean reputation and rise through the ranks in their career, having an addiction that is “prescribed” is a great way to hide it. To fight this, the Capricorn should shift gears a little bit. Change the focus from what society values to what our higher selves value. **Aquarius **(January 20 – February 18) | Video Games / Body Mutilation The Aquarius likes to handle its feelings in small and very specific ways. And on top of that, they tend to try to ‘solve’ all of their emotions, rather than simply experiencing them on a real level. Video games provide a fantasy-like outlet through which they can channel their emotions, while body harming provides the physical outlet of releasing emotion without actually having to experience any sadness. To solve this, the Aquarius needs to focus more on offering themselves the same kind of care and compassion that they easily give to everyone else. **Pisces **(February 19 – March 20) | Alcohol As one of the most empathic and sensitive signs of the zodiac, Pisces’ decision-making processes involve a lot of emotion. Their high degree of empathy means they’re usually attracted to people that are going no where. But because they fear hurting others, they tend to be reluctant about putting up healthy boundaries that might keep others out. Which makes alcohol the perfect way to escape having to deal with any of it. Fortunately, they also tend to be more in tune with their higher selves, and will likely find a better way to handle their problems. h/t [**Elite Daily**](http://elitedaily.com/life/addictions-for-all-zodiac-signs/1464889/)
